original: Alien Captive Recorded Log 20

original: Log Entry 4-11-2063\n\nThey think we're stupid; that we have no idea what they're up to. But we know. Barbed wire topped fences and security cameras be damned! We'll get the truth to come out if it's the last thing we do! The Conspiracy has to end, and we will be the ones who drag it from the shadows and cast it into the spotlight for all to see. They deny everything. They deny the place even exists! But here we are, faced with armed guards who patrol the dunes and robotic sentries calculating our every move. They're careful, but not careful enough. I've found a loophole, a way in, and I mean to exploit it soon.
translation: 日志条目 4-11-2063\n\n他们觉得我们愚蠢，以为我们对他们的勾当一无所知。但我们心里清楚。顶上有带刺铁丝的围栏和监控摄像头都见鬼去吧！哪怕这是我们做的最后一件事，也要让真相大白！这场阴谋必须终结，而我们将把它从阴影中拖出，置于众目睽睽的聚光灯下。他们否认一切，甚至否认那个地方的存在！可我们就在这儿，面对在沙丘上巡逻的武装警卫，还有时刻算计着我们一举一动的机器哨兵。他们小心翼翼，但还不够小心。我找到了一个漏洞，一条进去的路，而且打算尽快利用它。

original: Log Entry 4-15-2063\n\nWe've done it! We have it in our hands! The smoking gun... the evidence we need to prove that everything they've told the world is a lie! Now let's try to see them weasel their way out of this one and make petty excuses. The only reason they've been so successful this long is because of the lack of proof on our part. Now that's all over. As soon as the coast is clear, we're bringing this thing to the press. But for now, we need to lay low. No telling how long it'll take before they discover how we did it.
translation: 日志条目 4-15-2063\n\n我们做到了！弄到手了！这就是实锤……能证明他们向全世界所宣称的一切皆为谎言的证据！现在，且看他们这次如何开脱，找些微不足道的借口。长久以来，他们之所以能得逞，只是因为我们拿不出证据。现在，一切都结束了。一旦情况安全，我们就把这东西交给媒体。但眼下，我们得低调行事。谁也说不准，他们要多久才能发现我们是如何得手的。

original: Log Entry 4-16-2063\n\nThey're closing in! How did they find out? What did we miss? I thought we'd covered our tracks, but there must be something we'd forgotten. The security logs were completely erased, the inventory files were rewritten... that only leaves Doctor Morley! That bastard! He approached us saying he wanted to crack The Conspiracy wide open, and all the while he was playing us like fools! He just wanted to expose us, to bring us out into the open so they could eliminate us! Well, it's not going to work! They'll never find us and they'll never get their hands on the item!
translation: 日志条目 4-16-2063\n\n他们在步步紧逼！他们怎么发现的？我们遗漏了什么？我以为我们已经抹去了所有踪迹，但肯定还是疏忽了什么。安全日志已被彻底删除，库存文件也已重写……那就只能是莫利博士了！那混蛋！他主动找上我们，说想将这场阴谋彻底揭露，可自始至终都把我们当傻瓜耍！他就是想暴露我们，把我们引出来，好让他们将我们一网打尽！哼，这不会得逞的！他们永远找不到我们，也永远别想拿到那件东西！

original: Log Entry 5-01-2063\n\nBanks is dead. Combs is dead. I'm the only member of Quaere Verum left. I'm not certain how much longer I'll be safe here. I'm placing the item inside a specially constructed safe with a remote lock trigger. It'll take a damn genius hacker to get into this terminal and the safe can withstand anything they throw at it. Tomorrow I take the terminal and the safe, and I'm going to bury it out in the desert where they'll never find it. Hopefully, one day, someone else will discover the item and realize that they hold the key to unlocking the truth. All they need to do is succeed where we have failed. Good luck to us all.
translation: 日志条目 5-01-2063\n\n班克斯死了。库姆斯也死了。我是“探寻真相”组织仅剩的成员。我不确定自己还能在这儿安全多久。我要把这件东西放进一个特制的保险箱，它带有远程锁扣装置。得是个天才黑客才有可能侵入这个终端，而且这保险箱能抵御他们使出的任何手段。明天我会带上终端和保险箱，把它们埋在沙漠里，让他们永远找不到。希望有朝一日，其他人能发现这件东西，意识到自己掌握着揭开真相的钥匙。他们只需在我们失败的地方取得成功就行。愿我们所有人都好运。

original: MPLX "Novasurge" Prototype Plasma Pistol
translation: MPLX“新星涌动” 原型等离子手枪

original:
Project Name: MPLX (Military Plasma Experimental) "Novasurge"
Item: Prototype Plasma Pistol
Section: A61
Dept. Head: Doctor Aldwin Morley
Report Number: 040663-02

The Novasurge has proven to be a tough nut to crack. The output is still very high, causing massive injury to targets, but it's drawing far to much power from its energy cells. We also need to get the weight down on the weapon, as it's a bit heavy for a simple replacement sidearm. The problem still seems to be the coolant coils which are accounting for almost 50% of the weapon's weight. The good news is that the housing for the weapon has been approved, and this is likely the final design. Unfortunately, I need to increase our staff's hours to 7 days a week again so we can have the final prototype ready for testing by the end of the year.
translation:
项目名称：MPLX（军用等离子实验）“新星涌动”
物件：原型等离子手枪
部门：A61
部门负责人：奥尔德温·莫利博士
报告编号：040663-02

事实证明，新星涌动是一颗难处理的钉子。输出功率仍很高，能对目标造成重创，但从能量电池中汲取的能量过多。我们还需要减轻武器的重量，因为它作为一款简易替换副武器来说太重了。问题似乎仍出在冷却液线圈上，那几乎占据了武器重量的50%。好消息是，武器的外壳已经获批准，这很可能是最终设计。不幸的是，我又得增加我们人员的工作时间，一周工作7天，这样我们能在年底前准备好最终原型，以供测试。

original: Do you know anything helpful about the other sections of the ship?

original: I think you should remain in the Engineering Core for now.

original: I need to get through the Cryo Labs. Think you can help me?

original: Tell me how you were captured by these aliens.
translation: 跟我讲讲你是怎么被这些外星人抓住的。

original: Can you tell me more about where you're from?
translation: 你能多跟我讲讲你来自哪里吗？

original: Thank you for telling me about what happened to you.

original: I swear, if you don't calm down, I'll stuff you back in the freezer!

original: Just relax. Let me see what I can do.
translation: 放松，让我看看能做什么。

original: Don't worry, we ARE in this together, and I will help you.
translation: 别担心，我们是一起的，我会帮你。

original: My guess is the aliens had them for a snack... or worse.

original: Nope.

original: I'm afraid not. All I've found are these people.

original: Fine... I'll just put you back in stasis!
translation: 好……那我就把你放回去静滞！

original: I promise you, all I want to do is get off this ship and get back home.
translation: 我向你保证，我一心只想离开这艘飞船，回到家。

original: If I were with the aliens, the last thing I would have done is release you.
translation: 如果我跟外星人一伙，我最不可能做的事就是放了你。

original: Do I look like an alien?
translation: 我看起来像个外星人？

original: You're a doctor and you can't tell from looking at me that I'm no alien?

original: I can promise you I am not an alien. In fact, I was abducted like you.
translation: 我可以向你保证，我不是外星人。事实上，我和你一样也被绑架了。

original: You're a prisoner like the rest of us.
translation: 你跟我们其他人一样，都是囚犯。

original: Your uniform... it looks familiar, but I can't place it.
translation: 你的制服……看着眼熟，但我想不起来在哪见过。

original: It's okay, we're not going to hurt you... We're friends.
translation: 没事的，我们不会伤害你……我们是朋友。

original: I don't give guarantees. You want out of here, you stick with me. Period.
translation: 我从不打包票。想离开，跟紧我。就这样。

original: If I were working with the aliens, why would I set you free?
translation: 如果我跟外星人是一伙的，干嘛要把你放出来？

original: Look, all I want to do is work together as a team so we can get home.
translation: 听着，我们应该团结一心，才能回家。

original: I'm not a shit-kicking cowboy, that's for sure.
translation: 我不是个乡巴佬牛仔，这是肯定的。

original: I'm a human, like you.
translation: 我跟你一样，也是人类。

original: I'm trapped on this ship, just like you.
translation: 我跟你一样，被困在这艘船上了。

original: They're called aliens, hayseed.
translation: 他们就叫外星人，乡巴佬。

original: If you're talking about the aliens, you'll see them soon enough.
translation: 如果你说的是那些外星人，你马上就会见到他们。

original: The aliens? They're all over the place. That's why I woke you.
translation: 外星人？他们到处都是。所以我才弄醒你。

original: I'm open to suggestions.
translation: 我乐于接受意见。

original: We have an objective, soldier! We leave immediately.
translation: 我们有任务在身，士兵！我们马上离开。

original: Let me ask you something before I decide.
translation: 在我做决定之前，我想问你点事。

original: End it... put them out of their misery.
translation: 结束吧……帮他们摆脱痛苦。

original: Revive them and let them fight with us.
translation: 唤醒他们，让他们和我们并肩作战。

original: We should just put them out of their misery.
translation: 我们应该帮他们解脱痛苦。

original: How long can they last if you revive them?
translation: 你把他们唤醒后，他们能撑多久？

translation: 是的，或许你是对的。

original: Listen, we're all in danger if we stay here.
translation: 听着，我们要是继续留在这里，大家都有危险。

original: How did you do that?
translation: 你是怎么做到的？

original: Thanks, kid. We're getting out of here -- you want to come with us?
translation: 谢谢，孩子。我们要离开这里——你想跟我们一起走吗？

original: I'll take over from here.
translation: 从这儿开始由我来接手。

original: Do you have any idea where we are, or how to get back home?
translation: 你知道我们在哪，或者我们该怎么回家吗？

original: You're the one with the plan.
translation: 你是个有计划的人。

original: Do you think you can make use of that stuff you picked up in the Cryo Labs?
translation: 你觉得你能把在低温实验室捡到的那些东西派上用场吗？

original: Were you able to come up with any cryogenic weapons?
translation: 你想出什么低温武器了吗？

original: Any more Cryo Grenades or Cryo Mines ready?
translation: 有新的冷冻手榴弹或冷冻地雷做好了吗？

original: Any Cryo Grenades or Cryo Mines ready?
translation: 有做好的冷冻手榴弹或者冷冻地雷吗？

original: We need to find out what that was, and put a stop to it.
translation: 我们得弄明白那是什么，然后阻止它。

original: I have no idea what he said, but he sounded pretty angry.
translation: 我听不懂他说的话，不过听起来他很生气。

original: What the hell was that?
translation: 那到底是什么东西？

original: You think it was some sort of weapon?
translation: 你觉得那是某种武器吗？

original: Are you all alone? Where's your family?
translation: 你一直都是一个人吗？你的家人呢？

original: How do you know so much about this place?
translation: 你怎么会对这个地方如此了解？

original: I found this sword... does it belong to you?
translation: 我找到这把刀……它属于你的？

original: Yeah, I'm not getting a single word here.
translation: 耶，我一个字都听不懂。

original: I'm sorry, but I can't understand you.
translation: 很抱歉，但是我听不懂你说的话。

original: Oh, great. You don't speak English? This is going to be a waste of time.
translation: 哦，完啰。你不会说英语吗？这可就白费功夫了。

original: Calm down. We're trying to escape. Can you help us?
translation: 冷静点。我们在试着逃跑。你能帮帮我们么？

original: What? What are you saying?
translation: 什么？你在说什么？

original: Hey, are you okay?
translation: 嘿，你还好吗？

original: What do you know about this Toshiro Kago guy?
translation: 你知道什么有关加护俊这家伙的事吗？

original: Where's that Kago guy?
translation: 加护那家伙在哪？

original: I don't see that Kago fellow.
translation: 我没看见那个加护跟过来。

original: Where's that Kago guy?
translation: 加护那家伙在哪？

original: I'll handle this.
translation: 我能搞定。

original: Don't worry about it.
translation: 别担心。

original: How about I distract them, and you hit them from behind with a grenade?
translation: 我去吸引他们，你趁机从后面扔颗手榴弹炸他们，怎么样？

original: Take this Plasma Grenade.
translation: 拿着这个等离子手榴弹。

original: Take this Frag Grenade.
translation: 拿着这个破片手榴弹。

original: You sure this is a good idea?
translation: 你确定这是个好主意？

original: Forget the teleporter. Let's just go.
translation: 别管传送装置了。咱们用走的。

original: Okay, you wait here. I'll see if I can find the controls.
translation: 好，你们在这儿等着。我去看看能不能找到控制装置。

original: What did you get us into this time?
translation: 你这次又把我们弄到哪里了？

original: Let's go back the way we came.
translation: 咱们按原路返回吧。

original: I'm all right. How about you?
translation: 我没事。你呢？

original: I'm fine. No thanks to you.
translation: 我没事。这可多亏不了你。

original: Let's get back to the core.
translation: 咱们回中枢吧。

original: I guess we should split up.
translation: 我想我们应该分头行动。

original: Thanks for nothing, Sally.
translation: 我谢谢你啊，萨莉。

original: Well, that was... fun.  What now?
translation: 呃，那可真……有趣。现在怎么办？

original: So what are these generators? How do they work?
translation: 那么，这些发电机是什么？它们是如何工作的？

original: Okay, let's talk to the astronaut.
translation: 好的，咱们去和宇航员聊聊。

original: Why do we need a 'spaceman' to help us?
translation: 为什么我们需要一个“太空人”的帮忙？

original: Who are these people?

original: What are these things?

original: How are you holding up?
translation: 你感觉怎么样？

original: There's a teleporter to the bridge, but it doesn't work.
translation: 这有个通往舰桥的传送器，但它停了。

original: So we're here. Now what?
translation: 我们到这儿了，接着怎么做？

original: This has been a hell of a ride, hasn't it?
translation: 这趟旅程可真够受的，不是吗？

original: You think they'll ever come back?
translation: 你觉得他们还会回来？

original: What will you do now?
translation: 你现在打算做什么？

original: Thanks for your help. Couldn't have done it without you.
translation: 谢谢你的帮助。没你，这事办不成。

original: How's life in space?

original: Anything to report?

original: Whoops, sorry. Never mind.
translation: 哎呀，抱歉。当我没说。

original: I know you can't understand me, but I thought you might want this sword.
translation: 我知道你听不懂我的话，但我觉得你可能想要这把刀。

original: I found this sword... Is it yours?
translation: 我找到这把刀……它是你的吗？

original: Hey, you've been all over -- do you have any stuff hidden around here?
translation: 嗨，你已经把这转遍了—你有什么东西藏在这里吗？

original: What do you think the aliens want with us?
translation: 你觉得外星人想从我们这儿得到什么？

original: Sorry, forget I said anything.
translation: 抱歉，就当我什么都没说。

original: I found this recording of you. Do you want to talk about your family?
translation: 我找到了这段关于你的录音。你想聊聊你的家人吗？

original: You can talk about what happened to you. It's okay.
translation: 你可以谈谈你身上发生了什么，没关系的。

original: Oh, come on. You can tell me just about anything. I'll understand.
translation: 哦，别这样。你随便跟我说什么都行，我会懂的。

original: DLC05MZ1SomahClawLine
translation: DLC05MZ1SomahClawLine

original: If we're lucky, a friend of mine might show up to help.
translation: 如果我们幸运的话，我的一个朋友会帮忙的。

original: I found this recording... Sounds like you regret something you did.
translation: 我找到了这段录音……听起来你对你做过的事很后悔。

original: There must be a reason you don't want to talk about yourself. What is it?
translation: 你不愿意谈论你自己肯定是有原因的。到底是什么原因呢？

original: Forget I said anything.
translation: 忘了我说的话吧。

original: Hey, it's okay. You can tell me anything. I won't judge you.
translation: 嗨，没关系。你想对我说什么都行，我不会以此来评判你的。

original: Where's Paulson?
translation: 保罗森去哪儿了？

original: Why can't I use the door to get off the bridge?
translation: 为什么我不能走这扇门离开舰桥呢？

original: Not of This World
translation: 异界来客

original: Investigate the strange radio signal coming from the Wasteland.
translation: 调查来自废土的奇怪无线电信号。

original: Find a way out of the holding cell.
translation: 想办法离开囚室。

original: Retrieve your equipment.
translation: 取回你的装备。

original: Release Sally from her holding cell.
translation: 把萨莉从她的囚室里放出来。

original: Reach the engineering core of the ship.
translation: 抵达飞船的工程中枢。

original: (Optional) Free additional prisoners from their holding cells.
translation: （可选）将更多囚犯从囚室中释放。

original: Stage a fight with Somah to draw the guards' attention.
translation: 跟索玛打一架，以引起守卫的注意。

original: Defeat the alien guards.
translation: 消灭外星人守卫。

original: Continue to look for a way out of the Holding Cells.
translation: 继续寻找逃离囚室的出路。

original: Among the Stars
translation: 群星之间

original: Release the humans in stasis.
translation: 释放处于静滞状态的人类。

original: Destroy the generator in the Cryo Labs.
translation: 摧毁低温实验室中的发电机。

original: Destroy the generator in the Hangar.
translation: 摧毁机库中的发电机。

original: Destroy the generator in the Robot Assembly.
translation: 摧毁机器人装配车间中的发电机。

original: Gain access to the upper level of the alien ship.
translation: 设法进入外星人飞船顶层。

original: Speak to Sally.
translation: 与萨莉交谈

original: Find a way to activate the Access Teleporter.
translation: 想办法启动入口传送装置。

original: (Optional) Request help from the people you've revived.
translation: (可选) 向被你救出来的人寻求帮助。

original: This Galaxy Ain't Big Enough...
translation: 相逢在宇宙

original: Reach the bridge of the alien ship.
translation: 进入外星飞船的舰桥。

original: Disable the Death Ray.
translation: 关闭死光炮。

original: Secure the bridge.
translation: 肃清舰桥。

original: Defeat the attacking alien ship.
translation: 消灭袭来的外星飞船。

original: Return to the Capital Wasteland.
translation: 回到首都废土。

original: (Optional) Set the alien ship to self-destruct.
translation: (可选) 启动外星飞船自毁程序。

original: Activate the Engine Core Teleporter.
translation: 启动引擎中枢的传送装置。

original: Defeat the Alien Captain.
translation: 消灭外星人船长。

original: Your familiarity with alien technology gives you better control over their weapons, increasing their damage output by 20%.
translation: 对外星科技的熟练使得你能够更好掌握他们的武器，增加20%的伤害输出。

original: A new radio broadcast has been heard across the Capital Wasteland. While completely unintelligible, it sounds ominous...
translation: 横穿首都废土时可以听到新闻广播。尽管完全让人感到莫名其妙，但它听起来还是让人有种不详的预感。

original: Charging.  Please wait.
translation: 充能中，请等待

original: Would you like to rig this communicator to explode?
translation: 你想把这个通讯器改装成会爆炸的吗？

original: Would you like to rig this communicator to explode?
translation: 你想把这个通讯器改装成会爆炸的吗？

original: You lack the Science skill necessary to interact with this object. (Science %.0f or higher required)
translation: 你缺少必要的科技技能

original: The Stasis Chambers are functioning normally.
translation: 这些静滞舱运行正常。

original: The Stasis chambers are no longer functional.
translation: 这些静滞舱已无法正常运行。

original: The teleporter is powered down.
translation: 传送装置断电停止工作。

original: The Spacesuit must be worn while in Zero Atmosphere.
translation: 在真空环境中，必须穿着航天服。

original: This door can not be opened until the decompression sequence has been completed.
translation: 等待减压程序完成后,这扇门才能开启。

original: This door cannot be opened while the room is pressurized.
translation: 正处于增压状态中，这扇门无法开启。

original: The death ray is not ready to be fired.
translation: 死光炮断线状态。

original: Your Alien weapon is badly damaged.
translation: 你的外星武器严重损坏。

original: Death Ray fires at Earth's surface.
translation: 死亡射线射向地球表面。

original: This Recyling Station is recharging and not ready for use.
translation: 这个拱型医疗站正在重新充能中，还不能使用。

original: The archway has completely restored your health.
translation: 拱廊完全恢复了你的生命值。

original: The archway has restored your weapon condition.
translation: 拱廊恢复了你的武器状态。

original: The archway is recharging and not ready for use.
translation: 拱廊正在充能，暂无法使用。

original: Shields are currently up and holding.
translation: 力场已启动并发挥作用。

original: The teleporter jammer is currently running.
translation: 传送干扰发射台正处于工作状态。

original: The aliens have sealed the airlock door.
translation: 外星人已经封闭了气闸。

original: Would you like to rig this controller to explode?
translation: 你想要操纵这个控制器来引爆它吗？

original: This door is sealed, with no visible way to open it.
translation: 这扇门是密封的，无法开启。

original: Elliott Tercorien has died.
translation: 埃利奥特·特克里安已经死亡。

original: Somah has died.
translation: 索玛已经死亡。

original: Paulson has died.
translation: 保尔森已经死亡.

original: An examination of the device shows that the power to it can be increased, improving its effectiveness. This improvement would come at the expense of making the device burn out after several uses. Do you want to modify the device?
translation: 对该装置检查后发现，可以提高其功率，从而提升其效能。不过，这种改进的代价是装置在使用几次后就会烧毁。你想要对该装置进行改造吗？

original: You lack the Science skill necessary to interact with this object. (Science %.0f or higher required)
translation: 你缺少必要的科学技能来与该物体互动。（科学或者更高等级）

original: The drone pod requires a drone control device to activate.
translation: 无人机舱需要一个无人机控制装置才能启动。

original: The pod successfully links with your drone control device.
translation: 舱柜已成功连接至你的无人机控制设备。

original: You cannot activate another pod while the drone control device is active.
translation: 当无人机控制设备处于激活状态时，你无法启动另一个舱柜。

original: The assembly line electronics can we wired to overload after a slight second delay. An overload should cause a detonation and provide a way through.
translation: 装配线上的电子设备可以接线，在稍稍延迟几秒后过载。过载应该会引发爆炸并开辟出一条通路。

original: The assembly line electronics can we wired to overload. However, a higher Repair Skill is needed to set it with a slight delay (Repair Skill of 75%% required). An overload should cause a detonation and provide a way through.
translation: 装配线的电子设备可以被接线使其过载。然而，需要更高的修理技能才能将其设置为稍有延迟（需要75%的修理技能）。过载应该会引发爆炸并开辟出一条通路。

original: The archway has burned out and is no longer useful.
translation: 拱廊已被烧毁，无法再用了。

original: You can't use this while the Death Ray is changing position.
translation: 死光炮充能时你无法使用该对象。

original: You can't use this while the Death Ray is firing.
translation: 死光炮发射时你无法使用该对象。

original: The Death Ray is already in this position.
translation: 死光炮准备就绪。

original: The Death Ray is already at full charge.
translation: 死光炮处于满载状态。

original: The Alien Biogel appears to have side effects.
translation: 外星生物凝胶貌似有副作用。

original: Generator is currently online.
translation: 发电机已连线。

original: The jammer is currently online.
translation: 干扰发射机目前处于连接状态。

original: An examination of the device shows that it will burn out after %.0f more uses.
translation: 对该装置的检测显示该装置将在使用数次后烧毁。

original: The archway has restored some of your health.
translation: 拱廊恢复了你的一些生命值。

original: The archway has burned out and is no longer useful.
translation: 拱廊已被烧毁，无法再用了。

original: An examination of the device shows that it will burn out after 1 more use.
translation: 对该装置的检测显示该装置将在使用超过一次后烧毁。

original: Your training experience with alien weaponry has made you a Xenotech Expert.
translation: 你的外星武器训练经验使你成为一名外星技术专家。

original: I guess they're already looking for us... I can sneak past them in the vents, but you're too big to fit. We'll have to figure out how to get around.
translation: 我猜它们早就在找我们了…我可以从通风口绕过它们，可是你太大了。我们只能想办法躲开它们。

original: I'll stay here until it's safe, okay?
translation: 我会留在这里直到安全为止，好吗？

original: Shh! We don't want them to hear us!
translation: 嘘！我们可别让他们听见！

original: The kid's right... this kind of does look a bit like that TV show.
translation: 这孩子是对的…这一切这真有点像在像电视里演的那样。

original: I mean, not that I watched it a lot or anything.
translation: 我的意思是，我什么也没看到。

original: Anyway, uhh, sorry. What should I do?
translation: 总之，呃，抱歉。我该怎么做?

original: Stella Skyfire reporting for duty! She's Captain Cosmos' second in command, at least for the first few episodes...
translation: 史黛拉·天火报到！她是宇宙舰长的副手，至少在前几季里是这样……

original: What do you need?
translation: 想来点什么?

original: Eh?
translation: 呃?

original: Sir?
translation: 先生?

original: Well, that's the last of those turrets.
translation: 好了，那是最后一个炮塔。

original: Looks like we've got a problem though. The aliens have shut down the teleporters and I can't bring them back up.
translation: 不过，看起来我们遇到麻烦了。外星人关闭了传送器，我没办法重新启动。

original: We may have to look around for another way through.
translation: 我们可能得找找其他通过的办法了。

original: All right, now that things have quieted down, I'll see if there's something up here I can push to stop more of those tin cans showing up.
translation: 好了，既然现在东西都安静下来了，我看看能不能在这儿找到什么东西，按下后能阻止更多那些铁皮罐子出现。

original: Maybe I can turn off some other stuff too. And maybe I'll find a way back down. You keep looking for that generator!
translation: 或许我还能关掉其他一些东西。说不定还能找到下去的路。你继续去找那台发电机！

original: Feels like someone's twisted my insides into a knot...
translation: 感觉就像有人把我的五脏六腑都拧成了一团……

original: I'm sick to my stomach, but I'll manage.
translation: 我胃不舒服，但还能撑得住。

original: It hurts... can't seem to catch my breath.
translation: 好痛……感觉喘不上气来。

original: Let's keep going. I don't know how long I have.
translation: 继续走吧，我不确定我还能坚持多长时间。

original: Damn it. This... this burns like hell.
translation: 该死。这……这疼得像火烧一样。

original: Don't worry... I can keep going.
translation: 别担心……我能坚持走下去。

original: Oh man, I wish I had something for the pain.
translation: 哦，天哪，真希望有点东西来缓解一下疼痛。

original: Tatakai no kachimake ha, seme to seme no hazama ni aru.
translation: 战斗的胜负，取决于攻击的间隙。

original: Hajimari ni ketsumatu wo mi, ketsumatsu ni hajimari wo miru. Soremade wa dojite wa naran.
translation: 由始见末，由末见始。否则不可妄动。

original: Mokuteki naki okonai wa tadano kaze, ketsui aru okonai wa hue no shirabe to naru.
translation: 随意施为犹如风过无痕，心存决意方能奏响笛音。

original: Kotoba de wa tamashii wo iyasezu. Chinshi mokko aru nomi.
translation: 言语不能治愈灵魂。沉思冥想方可奏效。

original: Shiii!
Holy shit... Look at this place. I get the feeling we're in way over our heads.
translation: 妈的…看这地方。我有种不祥的预感，这事咱们可处理不了。

original: Are we better or worse off than we were before? I honestly can't tell.
translation: 我们比以前好还是比以前更糟？坦白说，我告诉不了你。

original: Well... at least we're not locked in a cell anymore.
translation: …至少我们不再被关在囚室里了。

original: Listen, I know how this shit works. We all go together, and we all get wiped out at the same time.
translation: 听着，我知道这烂剧情的套路。要是我们都一起行动，那大家就会同时被消灭。

original: No offense, but I'm gonna hang back for a bit. You need someone to keep an eye out behind you anyway.
translation: 别见怪，我打算先稍等一下。反正你们也需要有人在后面留意一下。

original: Don't worry, I'll catch up with you soon enough.
translation: 别担心，我很快就能赶上你的。

original: What are you still doing here? Follow the girl and make some progress, or else we're never getting out of here.
translation: 你还站在那里干嘛？跟着那个女孩，找找法子，不然我们别想从这里出去了。

original: Come on, kid. You're supposed to be heading towards the engine core, or whatever the hell it is. Get going.
translation: 快点，孩子。你应该朝着引擎核心之类的地方走。赶紧出发。

original: I already told you, I'll catch up with you. Get outta here!
translation: 我已经告诉你了，我能赶上你。快出去！

original: You're supposed to be heading for the engine core place, right? So get going!
translation: 你应该要前往引擎核心区域，对吧？那就赶紧动身！

original: What're you waiting for? Let the kid out already!
translation: 你还在等什么？让这孩子出去！

original: Might as well let the kid out. No sense leaving her stuck in there.
translation: 不如把那孩子放出来。没必要留她困在那儿。

original: So, this is it. Pretty neat, huh?
translation: 就是这儿啦。挺不错的，对吧？

original: I never had the courage to wake them up, but I think you're going to need to. The spaceman has a suit, and we need him to use it.
translation: 我一直没勇气叫醒他们，但我觉得你得这么做。那个太空人有一套衣服，我们得让他去用。

original: Aw, nuts.
translation: 哎呀，糟糕。

original: They turned it off! Last time I was here, I used this to get to the top of the ship.
translation: 他们把它关了！我上次来的时候，就是靠这个到飞船上层的。

original: It's kind of like an elevator, only it doesn't just go up and down. Feels sort of tingly, too.
translation: 它有点像电梯，只是不光是上下运行而已。用的时候还会有点刺痛感。

original: They must be pretty angry that we're exploring...
translation: 我们来探险，他们一定很生气……

original: Oh, I know! Come on, I know another way up!
translation: 哦，我知道了！来吧，我知道另一条上去的路！

original: Over here!
translation: 在这！

original: Okay, I'll show you what I found. If you want to get out of here, I think it'll help. Come on, follow me!
translation: 好的，我给你看我的发现。如果你想从这里出去，我觉得这会有帮助。来吧，跟着我！

original: Come on, we're almost there!
translation: 快点，我们快到了！

original: You want to get to the control room, right? Well, then you need to see the engine room first. I know how to get there.
translation: 你想去控制室，对吧？嗯，那你得先去看看引擎室。我知道怎么去那儿。

original: See? I told you I could help!
translation: 看见没？我告诉过你我能帮上忙！

original: Thanks! Are you escaping? Do you want to see the rest of this place? I've seen a bunch. I can show you if you want.
translation: 谢谢！你在逃跑吗？想看看这个地方的其他区域吗？我已经逛过不少地方了。只要你想，我可以带你去看。

original: You need my help to get out of here, right?
translation: 你需要我的帮助来逃出这里，不是吗？

original: I told you I can help. I'm super good at helping.
translation: 我告诉过你我能帮上忙。我是超级好帮手。

original: Okay, we've gotta find a way out of here.
translation: 好吧，我们找条出去的路。

original: Look, I'm glad we're still alive too, but can we celebrate later? Like, maybe after we actually get out of here?
translation: 听着，我也很高兴我们还活着，但能晚点庆祝吗？比如，等我们真的离开这后？

original: How about you pay less attention to me, and more to finding a way to get out of here.
translation: 还是少关心点我，多想想怎么从这出去吧?

original: Man, what the hell is this place? What do they want with all these people?
translation: 天哪，这到底是什么地方？他们要这些人干什么？

original: Come on, come on! We don't have time to waste! Get your shit, and let's get moving!
translation: 快点，快点！我们没时间浪费了！带上你的破烂，咱们赶紧走！

original: Grab anything useful, and let's go. Who knows how long it'll be before they send more after us!
translation: 拿上所有有用的东西，咱们走。谁知道他们多久之后会再派人来追我们！

original: I'm thinking maybe now you can understand it's a good idea to get the hell out of here.
translation: 我在想也许现在你能明白，赶紧离开这鬼地方是个好主意。

original: Stay against the wall, and get the hell away from me!
translation: 靠墙站着，别他妈惹我！

original: Let me guess: you can't find a way out, and so you're ready to go along with my plan.
translation: 让我猜猜：你找不到出路，所以准备按我的计划行事。

original: Am I right?
translation: 我说得对吗？

original: 'bout time you woke up. I was starting to think maybe they'd fried your brains or something.
translation: 你可算醒了。我都开始以为他们是不是把你的脑子给烧坏了还是怎么着。

original: You got a headache, right? Don't worry, that'll get better. I don't know if it'll matter, but it'll get better.
translation: 你头疼，对吧？别担心，会好起来的。我不知道这有没有意义，但总会好起来的。

original: They must really like you... at least they let me keep my clothes. Looks like they stripped you of everything.
translation: 他们肯定挺喜欢你……至少他们还让我留着衣服。看起来他们把你身上扒了个精光。

original: Hey, I didn't know you were exploring, too!  You don't know where we are, do you?
translation: 嘿，我不知道你也在探索呢！你不会知道我们在哪儿，对吧？

original: Okay, let's get out of this place!
translation: 好了，咱们离开这个地方吧！

original: Hey! Hey, are you okay? Skinned knee or anything like that?
translation: 嘿！嘿，你还好吗？有没有擦伤膝盖之类的？

original: Let's talk later, okay? We should be careful around here.
translation: 咱们稍后再聊，行吗？我们在这里得小心点。

original: So, it's done.
translation: 那么，搞定了。

original: I'm not much for talking, so I'll get to it. I owe you. Without you, I'd be dead, or worse.
translation: 我不怎么会说话，那就直说了。我欠你人情。没有你，我早就死了，说不定更糟。

original: Now if you'll excuse me, I'm going to see if I can find a way off this thing.
translation: 现在，失陪了，我去看看能不能找到离开这玩意的办法。

original: Yeah?
translation: 嗯？

original: Hey, I thought you should know... Someone must've hit a button during the fight just now.
translation: 嗨，有件事得告诉你……刚才混战中肯定有人误触了按钮。

original: If I understood the display correctly, I think we sort of launched a homing beacon of some kind down to the surface. Landed just outside DC.
translation: 要是我对显示屏的理解没错，我想我们好像朝地面发射了某种归航信标。落点就在特区外。

original: I wouldn't mention it, except that I think... Like I said, I'm not sure... I think it's a way to get back to earth.
translation: 本来不想说的，不过我觉得……就像我说的，不确定……但可能是返回地球的通道。

original: Seems like there's a teleporter in the Captain's quarters... I mean, I guess they're your quarters now.
translation: 舰长舱室里有台传送装置……现在应该说是你的舱室了。

original: So I guess you can go home if you want. Don't worry, I'll stick around up here and keep an eye on things.
translation: 所以如果你想的话，大概就能回家了。别担心，我会留在这儿留意情况。

original: We did it! We really did it!
translation: 我们做到了！我们真的做到了！

original: Oh man, I can't believe it! I never thought we'd make it!
translation: 哦，我真不敢相信！我从没想过我们会成功。

original: You're the best. The absolute best. I'd be dead without you, or worse. Thank you so much.
translation: 你最棒了。绝对是最棒的。要不是你，我早就死了，甚至更糟。太谢谢你了。

original: Need something?
translation: 需要点什么?

original: Always good to see you.
translation: 见到你很高兴。

original: I see you're still in one piece.
translation: 我看你还是好好的嘛。

original: Hey, guess what? You can go home!
translation: 嗨，猜猜是什么?你能回家了！

original: I was looking at the controls on the bridge here, and most of it doesn't make any sense to me because it's in that weird alien language.
translation: 我看了下舰桥上的那堆开关，大部分对我来说根本没用，因为上面全是些奇怪的外星语言。

original: But there's this one thing I saw, and I think maybe I accidentally pushed a button while we were fighting that big ship.
translation: 但是有一个按钮，我想在我们跟那艘大船打仗的时候我不小心按了它。

original: And I think maybe the button I pushed sent some kind of a thing back down to earth. I didn't mean to, honest. But this is a good thing!
translation: 我认为也许我按的按钮发送了某种东西返回到地球上。说实话，我不是有意的。但是，这看上去是一件好事！

original: I think now you can use the teleporter in the Captain's quarters to get back to earth. Pretty great, isn't it?
translation: 我想现在你可以使用舰长的传送装置来返回地球。很好，不是吗?

original: Anyway, I just thought I should tell you.
translation: 不管如何，我想我应该告诉你。

original: Yay! We won! I knew we could do it, I knew we could beat them!
translation: 耶！我们赢啦！我就知道我们能行，早就说我们能干翻他们！

original: You're even better than Captain Cosmos!
translation: 你比宇宙舰长还厉害！

original: Hello there, Captain! What can I do for you?
translation: 你好，舰长！我能为你做些什么吗?

original: What's going on?
translation: 发生了什么事？

original: Hi there!
translation: 你好！

original: I hear there's a way off this boat. I'll let you go first, just to make sure it works, and then I'm outta here.
translation: 我听到一个离开这艘船的办法。我会让你先走，确保此方法有效后，我再离开这里。

original: Nice work, kid.
translation: 干得不错啊，年轻人。

original: If there's more of them out there, that'll make 'em think twice about attacking us again.
translation: 要是他们还有同伙的话，这玩意儿应该能让他们三思而后行。

original: And it looks like you're now in charge of your very own spaceship. Well, what's left of it anyway. Congrats.
translation: 看来你现在可是有专属飞船的人了，反正剩下的部分都归你了。恭喜啦。

original: What can I do for you, Mr. Hot-shot space captain?
translation: 你现在需要我做什么，太空船“大人物”？

original: If there's more of them out there, that'll make 'em think twice about attacking us again.
translation: 要是他们还有同伙的话，这玩意儿应该能让他们三思而后行。

original: And it looks like you're now in charge of your very own spaceship. Well, what's left of it anyway. Congrats.
translation: 看来你现在可是有专属飞船的人了，反正剩下的部分都归你了。恭喜啦。

original: Jyama wo suru na.
translation: 不要烦我。

original: Onushi wa nanimono? Koko wa doko da?
translation: 你是谁？这是哪里？

original: Sessha no ken! Sessha no ken wa dokoda?
translation: 在下的剑！在下的剑在哪里？

original: Nanto? Nani wo nozonde orunoda. Nani yue, onushi no iu koto ga wakaranu noda?
translation: 怎么？看什么看。老大说的话难道你听不懂吗？真他妈让人生气，老子拿刀砍你信不信。

original: Ken wo ubawarete shimatta, taegataki kutsujoku!
translation: 剑被夺去了。难以忍受的耻辱！

original: Ken wo sugu torimodo saneba naranu!
translation: 不快点找回剑不行！

original: Nani ga okotta noka, kento ga tsukanu.
translation: 没有剑，用不了剑术。

original: Youjutsu de sessha wo toraeta youkai me. Kono mama de wa okanu zo!
translation: 不能放任用妖术抓了在下的妖怪不管！

original: Youkai kara mi wo mamoru niwa, ken ga iru.
translation: 从妖怪手中保护自己需要剑。

original: Hito wo azakeru na. Onushi no monoii wa sappari wakaran.
translation: 别耍我，完全不知你说的啥。

original: Sessha wo tasuke takuba, sessha no ken wo sagashi dase!
translation: 想帮在下就把在下的剑找出来。

original: Woah, hang on a tick. I don't know anythin' about anythin' in this section, so I'm headin' back to the Engine Core.
translation: 哇哦，稍等一下。这区域的东西我一无所知，所以我要回引擎中枢了。

original: Good work. But don't get cocky.
translation: 干得好。但别太得意了。

original: Still one generator to blow up... Figure you should be off doing that instead of hanging around here.
translation: 还有一台发电机要炸掉……我觉得你该去做这事，而不是在这里闲逛。

original: You can pat yourself on the back when you've blown up all the generators, not just one of 'em.
translation: 等你炸毁所有发电机的时候再自豪吧，而不只是炸毁其中一台。

original: Where are they? Where are the little buggers?
translation: 他们在哪？那些小臭虫去哪了？

original: Well? What do you want?
translation: 恩？你想要干什么？

original: Speak your piece.
translation: 说说你的意见。

original: Yeah? What is it?
translation: 嗯？什么事？

original: Wait, wait. I have no idea how I'm going to be of any help in this part of the ship, so I'm going to stay behind in the Engine Core.
translation: 等等，等等。我不知道在飞船的这个区域能帮上什么忙，所以我打算留在引擎中枢。

original: Now that all three generators are destroyed, you're going to have to take a walk outside. I just hope that old spacesuit is still sealed properly.
translation: 既然三台发电机都被毁了，你得出去一趟了。只希望那套旧航天服的密封性还完好。

original: Hurry up taking out the last generator if you can. I don't feel comfortable staying near that giant engine core for much longer.
translation: 要是行的话，赶紧搞定最后一台发电机。在那巨大的引擎核心附近待太久，我心里不踏实。

original: Hey, you're doing great... only two more generators and we can move on. Just hang in there, I know this is rough.
translation: 嘿，你干得真棒……只剩两台发电机了，完成后我们就能继续下一步。坚持住，我知道这很艰难。

original: What's... what's going on? Who are all these people?
translation: 这……这是怎么回事？这些人都是谁？

original: What's on your mind?
translation: 你有什么想法？

original: Oh hey. What's up?
translation: 嗨。怎么了？

original: Hey there... what did you need?
translation: 嘿，好呀……你有什么事吗？

original: I don't really think I'm going to be of any use here, so I'm heading back to the Engine Core.
translation: 我实在觉得自己在这儿派不上用场，所以我打算回引擎中枢。

original: Just do what the girl says... get them out of those things.
translation: 按女孩说的做……把他们从那些东西里弄出来。

original: I guess it's time for your space walk. Lucky you.
translation: 我想该轮到你进行太空行走了。你可真幸运。

original: One more generator and we can get to the top of this ship. Then we can hit the aliens where it really hurts.
translation: 再搞定一台发电机，我们就能到达飞船顶层。然后就能给外星人致命一击。

original: Nice work taking out that generator. Only two more to go.
translation: 干得好，摧毁了那台发电机。只剩两台了。

original: Hope this is important.
translation: 希望这很重要。

original: If you got something you want to say, spit it out.
translation: 如果你想要什么东西你就说，痛快点。

original: Yeah? Something bugging you?
translation: 耶？什么事让你心烦？

original: Wow, you did it!
translation: 哇，你做到了！

original: Now you're gonna have to go outside of the ship. I know it looks scary, but that's the only way to the top.
translation: 现在你得走出飞船。我知道这看起来很可怕，但这是到达顶层的唯一途径。

original: Oh! Make sure you wear a spacesuit before you go out there or you could die! Don't forget!
translation: 哦！出去之前一定要穿上太空服，否则你会没命的！别忘了！

original: Yay! Only one more of those generators is all you need to take care of and we can get to the bridge and kick some alien butt!
translation: 耶！你只需再搞定一台那种发电机，我们就能前往舰桥，踢那些外星人屁股！

original: I knew it! I knew it!
translation: 我就知道！我就知道！

original: The lights went out for a few seconds and I just KNEW you took out one of those generators. All you have to do is two more and we can leave.
translation: 灯光灭了几秒钟，我就知道你搞定了一台发电机。你只要再毁掉两台，咱们就能离开了。

original: Here it is! This is the stuff I hid in here. You can have all of it, okay?
translation: 就在这儿！这就是我藏在这里的东西。你可以全拿走，好吗？

original: Come on, I'll show you where the stuff is!
translation: 来啊，我给你看看我藏了什么东西。

original: Didja need something?
translation: 要点什么？

original: Whatcha want?
translation: 想要什么？

original: Hang on, hang on! I can't get the doors unlocked THAT fast. Sheesh!
translation: 坚持，坚持！我没法那么快就把门打开。该死 ！

original: Oh no! That poor astronaut! Those freezers are so dangerous... sometimes people don't wake up.
translation: 哦，不！可怜的宇航员！那些冰柜太危险了……有时候人就醒不过来了。

original: I guess you'd better take his suit. You're going to have to go if he can't. But first you have to get to the door to the outside.
translation: 我想你最好穿上他的宇航服。要是他去不了，就得你去。但首先你得走到通往外部的舱门那里。

original: They'll be waiting for you, but you can suck out all the air in part of the ship so they won't get in your way.
translation: 他们会在那儿等着你，不过你可以把飞船部分区域的空气都抽光，这样他们就没法阻拦你了。

original: They have these generator things that power parts of the ship and make sure it has air. You'll have to turn some of them off.
translation: 他们有些类似发电机的东西，为飞船的部分区域供电，并确保有空气供应。你得关掉其中一些。

original: There's one in the Cryo Lab, one in the Hangar Bay and one where they make the robots... the Robot Assembly area.
translation: 低温实验室有一个，机库有一个，还有一个在制造机器人的地方……也就是机器人装配区。

original: Once they're all broken, you can get through that door to the outside.
translation: 等这些都坏了，你就能穿过那扇门到外面去了。

original: And then once you get to the top of the ship, you can turn the teleporter thing back on, and I can catch up to you!
translation: 然后等你到了飞船上层，就可以重新启动传送装置，这样我就能赶上你啦！

original: I guess it's time for me to get those doors unlocked for you now. This is fun!
translation: 我想现在是时候帮你把那些门打开了。真有意思！

original: You need to wake up the spaceman there. We can't get up to the top of the ship unless he uses his space suit.
translation: 你得叫醒那边的太空人。除非他穿上太空服，否则我们没法到飞船上层。

original: Well now, that was something...
translation: 现在好了，那是什么东西…

original: Holy shit, did you see that? What was that thing? Some crazy alien Death Ray?
translation: 妈的，你看到了没?那是什么玩意？某种疯狂的外星“死光”？

original: Oh, great. Another dark and scary part of the ship.
translation: 哦，好极了。这船上的另外一个又黑又吓人的地方。

original: Well at least it's someplace different, right?
translation: 至少地方不同了，对吧？

original: You're going through that next teleporter first, right?
translation: 你会先穿过下一个传送装置，对吗？

original: So we're going to follow you through that next one, huh? Okay. I'll... I'll go through last.
translation: 所以我们跟着你去下一个，呃？很好。我…我最后一个走。

original: Don't care for these "teleporter" things at all.
translation: 一点也不在乎这些个"传送装置"。

original: Let's hope this is over soon.
translation: 希望快点结束。

original: Ready when you are. Be right behind you.
translation: 等你准备好。紧紧跟着你。

original: Glad to see you're holding up.
translation: 很高兴看见你还能撑得住。

original: We didn't get much opposition, so either they don't know exactly where we are, or they're busy with something else.
translation: 我们并没有遭到太多的抵抗，它们也许不知道我们到底在哪里，或者它们忙于其他事情去了。

original: Looks like they're still trying to keep us out of the teleporters, huh? Only one way to go. Might as well take it.
translation: 看来它们一直在试图阻止我们接近传送装置，你说呢？就算只有一条路可走，我们也得闯一闯。

original: Go on ahead through. We'll be right behind you.
translation: 往前走吧。我们是你的后盾。

original: Guess they know what we're up to, so they're shutting off the teleporters. Trying to cut us off.
translation: 估计他们知道我们要干什么了，所以才关掉传送装置，想截住我们。

original: Which means they're probably waiting on the other side of that door.
translation: 这意味着他们很可能就在那扇门的另一边守着。

original: We'll hold this point. You go on ahead and see if you can find the controls for this teleporter. We'll make sure they don't sneak up behind you.
translation: 我们会守住这里。你先走，看看能不能找到这个传送器装置的控制器。我们会确保他们不会从后面偷袭你。

original: We're kind of pinned down here until you find the other end of that teleporter. You might want to get working on that.
translation: 在你找到传送装置另一端之前，我们有点被困在这儿了。你最好赶紧去找找。

original: Wow... did you see that?
translation: 哇……你看到了吗？

original: Scary, but also kind of a stupid move on their part, don't you think?
translation: 挺吓人的，但是这么干也挺愚蠢的，你说呢？

original: Well hey there, fancy meeting you here!
translation: 嘿，能在这碰到你真好！

original: Nice work. Now what?
translation: 干得不错。接下来怎么办？

original: You're really good at this. I hope it wasn't too scary...
translation: 你对这个真的很在行。希望这没有太吓人……

original: Oh no, they turned this one off too!
translation: 哦不，他们把这个也关掉了！

original: You're going to have to find the other end and turn it back on.
translation: 你得找到另一端，把它重新打开。

original: Did you see that? Did you see that big gun they just fired?
translation: 看到没？你看到那大跑刚才开火了吗？

original: We need to turn off that big Death Ray thing before they blow up the whole Earth!
translation: 我们必须关掉那大死光，在它们毁灭地球之前！

original: I knew you'd get it. Good job!
translation: 我知道你会办到的。干得好！

original: Now we have to get to the bridge, where their leader is.
translation: 现在我们必须去舰桥，那里有它们的首领。

original: Wait here. I'll get the door!
translation: 等等。我去开门！

original: This is crazy, right? It's not just me? We're actually trying to escape from a spaceship? Crazy...
translation: 真疯狂，对吧？不光我这么觉得吧？我们居然真的在设法从一艘宇宙飞船上逃出去？太疯狂了……

original: You know the odds of getting out of this alive are pretty small, right? I'm just saying.
translation: 你知道活着离开这里的几率相当小，对吧？我只是实话实说。

original: Just between you and me, I'm surprised at how well I'm coping. I mean, I think I'm coping. Unless I've just lost my mind already...
translation: 就咱俩私下说，我很惊讶自己应对得居然还不错。我是说，我觉得自己还应付得来。除非我已经彻底疯了……

original: Aliens... who'd have believed it? This is nuts.
translation: 外星人……谁能相信呢？这太疯狂了。

original: We need to make 'em pay. Every last one.
translation: 我们得让他们付出代价，一个都不放过。

original: This ain't the time for standing around and talking.
translation: 现在可不是站着闲聊的时候。

original: Let's just keep moving.
translation: 咱们继续行动吧。

original: Quite a little band of misfits we've got here, huh?
translation: 在这有点儿不适应，呃？

original: If I get out of here, no one's going to believe this. Hell, I'm not sure I believe it.
translation: 如果我能出去，没有一个人会相信。可恶，连我自己都不怎么确信。

original: I think we're getting close. Just gotta keep moving.
translation: 我觉得我们快到了。继续前进就好。

original: So if we do manage to get off this ship, then what? We just go back home like nothing happened? I don't know if I can do that.
translation: 所以就算我们真设法离开了这艘飞船，然后呢？就像什么都没发生过一样回家？我不知道自己能不能做到。

original: I'm not quite sure where to go, but I think if we keep going this way we'll find what we're looking for.
translation: 我不太确定该往哪里走，但我想，如果我们顺着这条路走，就会找到我们要找的。

original: This is kind of exciting, isn't it? I've never seen this part of the ship before!
translation: 这还挺令人兴奋的，不是吗？我以前从没见过飞船的这个部分！

original: I sure hope they don't figure out where we are. This time I don't think they're going to put me back in the cell...
translation: 我真心希望他们别搞清楚我们在哪儿。这次我觉得他们不会再把我关回牢房了……

original: Can't be real... this can't be happening...
translation: 不可能是真的…这不该发生…

original: I'll wake up any minute now... just need to wake up.
translation: 我随时都会醒过来的……只要醒了就好。

original: Nope, nope. Not real, none of it is real. Can't hurt me if it's not real.
translation: 不，不。不是真的，一切都不是真的。不是真的，就伤不到我。

original: Come on, follow me! I'll show you what the generators do.
translation: 来把，跟着我！我会告诉你怎么弄发电机。

original: Almost there!
translation: 几乎都在！

original: Is it safe yet?
translation: 这还安全吗？

original: This is a fine mess we're in, isn't it?
translation: 这真是一团糟，对吧？

original: Don't lose it, okay? We can get through this.
translation: 别灰心，好吗？我们能挺过去的。

original: We've gotta get out of here.
translation: 我们必须离开这里。

original: Thanks for letting me out!
translation: 多谢你放我出来！

original: This is exciting, isn't it!
translation: 真爽，不是吗！

original: Be careful, okay?
translation: 小心，好吗？

original: I sure hope we don't get caught!
translation: 我真的希望我们不会被抓住。

original: Captain on the bridge!
translation: 舰长就位！

original: All systems normal, Captain!
translation: 所有系统正常，舰长！

original: Hi there!
translation: 你好！

original: Welcome home, Captain!
translation: 欢迎回家，舰长！

original: Astronaut Sally, at your service!
translation: 宇航员萨莉，为你服务！

original: Hey, good to see you again.
translation: 嗨，真高兴又见到你。

original: I don't even want to know what it's like down there.
translation: 我根本不想知道下面现在什么样。

original: Welcome aboard.
translation: 欢迎登船。

original: Anything I can help with?
translation: 我能帮着干点什么吗？

original: Where are they? I'll kill those little bastards!
translation: 它们在哪？我要干掉这些杂种。

original: I guess we're done down here. Time to take the fight to the aliens.
translation: 我想我们在这儿的事都做完了。是时候去找外星人算账了。

original: Not too shabby, kid.
translation: 干得不错，孩子。

original: Got one, eh? Well, it's a start.
translation: 搞定了一台，嗯？好，这开了个头。

original: Flyin' ships... now I've seen everything.
translation: 在天上飞的船…我现在真算是长见识了。

original: That generator has to be around here somewhere.
translation: 那个发电机一定在这附近的什么地方…

original: There's more aliens in here... I can smell 'em.
translation: 这有更多的外星人……我都能闻到他们了。

original: I wish we knew how to use of these flyin' ships. Would have been a lot easier than sneakin' around.
translation: 我希望我们知道怎么开这些飞船，这比在附近躲藏容易多了。

original: What's troublin' ya?
translation: 你有什么麻烦吗？

original: Somethin' on your mind?
translation: 你在想什么吗？

original: Yeah?
translation: 嗯？

original: What are you lookin' at?
translation: 你在看什么？

original: All right, get that suit on and get outside. The sooner we get out of here the better!
translation: 好了，穿上那身宇航服，到外面去。咱们越早离开这儿越好！

original: Only one more of those damn generators to go and we can get the hell out of here.
translation: 就差一个该死的发电机了，搞定它我们就可以离开这鬼地方了。

original: One down! Way to go!
translation: 干掉一台啦！好样的！

original: Huh... wha? Where am I?
translation: 额…什么？我在哪？

original: I don't know about you, but I'd like to find that generator and get back to the engine core.
translation: 我不知道你怎么想，但我想找到那台发电机，然后回到引擎核心。

original: Freezing people then bringing them back to life. Amazing.
translation: 让被冻起来的人起死回生。真是神奇。

original: These aliens... why are they experimenting on us? What do they want to do to us?
translation: 这些外星人……他们为什么在我们身上做实验？他们想把我们怎么样？

original: If we would have had access to this kind of medical technology back on earth, so many people wouldn't have died in the war.
translation: 如果我们能获得这种医疗技术带回地球，很多人就不必在战争中死去了。

original: Oh... hi.
translation: 哦…嗨。

original: This place... it's giving me the creeps.
translation: 这个地方……让我毛骨悚然。

original: Gah! Don't sneak up on me like that.
translation: 啊！别偷偷摸摸对我做那种事。

original: I hope we get out of here soon. I don't know how much more of this I can take.
translation: 我希望我们尽快离开这里。我不知道我还能坚持多久。

original: Got all the generators, huh? Time to take a walk outside.
translation: 已经摧毁所有发电机了，是吧？现在差不多该去外头溜达溜达了。

original: Nice work... one more generator and we can get the heck out of the engine core.
translation: 干得漂亮……再搞定一台发电机，我们就能离开这鬼引擎核心了。

original: One generator down and two to go. Keep it up, kid.
translation: 搞定了一台发电机，还剩下两台。继续努力，孩子。

original: Wow, I'd love to get my hands on some of this equipment. I could make a fortune back on earth.
translation: 哇喔，我真想抱走一些这样的设备。等回到地球上我就可以好好赚上一笔。

original: Those assembly lines remind me of the pens we kept our slav... ummm, I mean our prisoners in.
translation: 这些流水线让我想起了咱们关押我们的奴隶的围栏…喔，我的意思是我们的犯人。

original: I've never seen anything like this place. Everything builds itself... crazy.
translation: 我从未见过任何像这样的事。每样东西都在自行生产…真是疯狂。

original: Holy shit. If I'd had even a few of these robots back home...
translation: 该死的。如果我能带那堆机器人里的一些回家的话…

original: Yeah? Need something?
translation: 嗯？需要什么吗？

original: I hope that little girl knows what she's talking about, or we're in for some serious trouble.
translation: 我希望那个小女孩知道她在说什么，否则我们可就要有大麻烦了。

original: This ship is huge. How did they build something this big?
translation: 这艘船如此巨大。他们究竟是如何制造出这么大的东西的？

original: I can't believe I'm saying this, but I actually miss those old Salisbury Steaks back home.
translation: 真不敢相信我会这么说，不过我确实想念家乡那些老式索尔兹伯里牛排了。

original: You did it! You did it! Whoohoo!
translation: 你做到了！你做到了！哇哦！

original: Only one more of those generators to go! Wow!
translation: 还差一个发电机了！哇！

original: You blew up one of the generators! We might actually get out of here!
translation: 你炸毁了其中一台发电机！我们也许真的能从这里逃出去啦！

original: Hiya, Mister.
translation: 好呀，先生。

original: Hiya, Lady.
translation: 好呀，女士。

original: Hope we find what we're looking for soon.
translation: 希望我们马上找到我们找的东西。

original: I can't get off this ship fast enough.
translation: 我没有足够的时间下船。

original: Are we there yet?
translation: 我们到了吗？

original: At least I'm still in one piece...
translation: 至少我还安然无恙。

original: I think we're getting closer.
translation: 我认为我们正在接近。

original: Is everything okay?
translation: 你还好吗？

original: Hey there, little one. So, are your parents anywhere aboard this ship?
translation: 嗨，小家伙，你的父母在这飞船上吗？

original: Hey Somah, can you tell me how it all ends up? You know, what happens down there?
translation: 嘿，索玛，你能告诉我这一切是怎么结束的吗？你知道，下面发生什么了？

original: Hey there, ummm... I don't mean to bother you and all... ummm...
translation: 嗨，呃…我不是故意打扰你的…呃…

original: Wow, so you were down there when all this started. Right before the bombs fell. That's crazy.
translation: 哇，那么说来这一切刚开始的时候你就在下面？就在核弹落下之前。真不可思议。

original: Hey sweetie, can I talk to you a second?
translation: 嗨，小可爱，能和你聊一会儿吗？

original: So, what's your story, tough guy?
translation: 硬汉，你的故事呢?

original: Did you have to help a lot of people who were hurt when you were in the war?
translation: 你在战争期间是不是经常要救助很多受伤的人？

original: Somah, what's it like down there? Is it still the same?
translation: 索玛，下面怎么样？还是老样子吗？

original: Hey, mister? Are you a real cowboy?
translation: 嘿，先生？你是真正的牛仔吗？

original: I'll stay right with you!
translation: 我会紧跟着你！

original: Okay, come on!
translation: 好嘞，走吧！

original: Sure thing.
translation: 当然。

original: All right.
translation: 好吧。

original: Sir, yes sir!
translation: 是，长官！

original: Okay!
translation: 好！

original: See you later!
translation: 回头见！

original: I'll keep an eye on the ship for you!
translation: 我会替你看着这飞船的！

original: Yep, not like I'm going anywhere.
translation: 是的，我哪也不想去。

original: We'll be here if you need us.
translation: 如果你需要我们的话，我们会在这的。

original: Be careful down there.
translation: 在下面小心点。

original: Just hurry up and find us a way off of this ship before we all end up frozen again.
translation: 得快点想办法让我们离开这飞船，不然我们都得再次被冻起来。

original: Sure, just watch my back and I'll watch yours.
translation: 当然，那就看紧我身后，而我也会看着你的。

original: Okay. Tell me if you need medical assistance.
translation: 好的，如果你需要医疗援助就找我。

original: Go on, don't let me stop you.
translation: 走吧，别让我耽误了你。

original: Yeah, sure. I'll keep your spot warm.
translation: 嗯，没事。我会帮你留着这地儿。

original: Yeah, yeah. Just don't think about ditching me... we're in this together.
translation: 行行行。只是别想着撇下我……咱们同处一条船。

original: You go do what you have to do.
translation: 你去干你该干的。

original: Fine... I'll be here.
translation: 好吧……我就待在这儿。

original: Suit yourself.
translation: 随你便。

original: Remember to wear the spacesuit before you go outside or you could die!
translation: 去外面前记得穿上太空服，不然你会死的！

original: Don't go alone... those generators are in scary places. Take one of the grown-ups with you!
translation: 别一个人去……那些发电机在的地方挺吓人的。最好带大人跟你一起去！

original: Don't worry, I'll be safe with these guys. They seem pretty neat.
translation: 不用担心。我和这些家伙在一起会很安全的。他们看上去很厉害。

original: Oh, I hope we can find my sister somewhere.
translation: 哦，我希望我们能在哪儿找到我姐姐。

original: Be careful, lady.
translation: 小心，女士。

original: Be careful, mister.
translation: 小心，先生。

original: Be careful!
translation: 小心！

original: You're doing a great job. Really.
translation: 你干得真棒。

original: Let's hope they don't figure out where we are.
translation: 希望他们搞不清楚我们在哪里。

original: Just keep cool, and we'll get through this.
translation: 保持冷静，我们就能度过这一关。

original: All right, I'll make sure they don't cut us off.
translation: 好的，我确保它们不会把我们隔断的。

original: They know we're coming, so be careful.
translation: 他们知道我们要来了，所以小心点。

original: We might actually make it...
translation: 我们或许真的能成功……

original: I hope we can find that Death Ray before they use it again.
translation: 我希望能在它们再次使用死光前找到它。

original: First aliens, now Death Rays. This is like a crazy TV show.
translation: 先是外星人，现在是死光。就像一个疯狂的电视节目。

original: Good idea.
translation: 好主意。

original: You know where to find me.
translation: 你知道在哪能找到我。

original: I sure hope so, for all our sakes.
translation: 为了我们大家着想，我真心希望如此。

original: No one asked you to thaw me out.
translation: 没人让你把我解冻。

original: Hey, at least down there we're free... well, most of us anyway. So let's just get the hell out of here.
translation: 嘿，至少在下面我们是自由的……嗯，反正我们大多数人是。所以，咱们赶紧离开这鬼地方。

original: Sorry, you'll just have to learn to deal with it like the rest of us.
translation: 抱歉，你只能学着像我们其他人一样接受现实了。

original: Tell you what. I'll do the shooting, and you do the patching. It's the only way we're gonna make it out of here alive.
translation: 听我说。开枪的事交给我，你负责救治。只有这样我们才能活着离开这里。

original: Sure, sure. Don't worry. Don't worry...
translation: 当然，当然。别担心。别担心……

original: Yeah, uh... well, glad we talked. I know I feel better... ummm... ok...
translation: 是的，嗯…很好，很高兴与你谈心，我感觉好多了…

original: It's okay, Somah. It's my problem... I'll deal with it.
translation: 没事，索玛。这是我的问题……我会处理好的。

original: Aw, thanks Somah! You're the best!
translation: 哇，谢谢你，索玛！你是最棒的！

original: Thanks, Mr. Tercorien. I knew you'd help.
translation: 谢谢你，特克里安先生。我知道你会帮上忙的。

original: Come on, make it look good!
translation: 来吧，尝尝我的厉害！

original: Hit me! Come on, hit me!
translation: 打我啊！来打我啊！

original: Yeah, we're really fighting now, aren't we?
translation: 耶，我们现在准备开打了是吧？

original: Youkai me oujo sei!
translation: 保护小姐！

original: Towaaaaaa!
Oryaaaaaa!
Tear 'em up!
translation: 撕碎他们！

original: Take 'em out!
translation: 摧毁它们！

original: Aim for the head!
translation: 瞄准头部！

original: You're mine, sucker!
translation: 你是我的，贱货。

original: I got somethin' special for ya!
translation: 我有点特殊东西给你！

original: I'm gonna mess you up!
translation: 我要搞死你！

original: Opening fire!
translation: 开火！

original: Take them down!
translation: 打垮它们！

original: Payback time!
translation: 现在反击！

original: Come on, you bastards!
translation: 来啊，你们这群杂种！

original: Oh, you want some of this?
translation: 哦，你想来点这个吗？

original: Take this!
translation: 接招！

original: I'll bury every last one of ya!
translation: 我要把你们全部埋葬！

original: I'll blast you in half!
translation: 我要把你们炸成两半！

original: I'm puttin' you down!
translation: 我要把你打倒！

original: End of the road for you!
translation: 送你上路！

original: Kill all of 'em!
translation: 杀光他们！

original: If I go, you're comin' with me!
translation: 我就算死也要拉你陪葬！

original: Ow, hey, not too hard!
translation: 哎哟，嘿，别太用力！

original: Hey, kid! Be careful!
translation: 嗨，孩子，小心点！

original: Oww!
translation: 哇！

original: Oh, that really hurts!
translation: 额，打的好！

original: Aaa, atama ga!
translation: 啊，啊嗒玛噶！

original: Uuu, ude ga!
translation: 呜，呜得噶！

original: Ashi ga!
translation: 啊啊！

original: Oou!
translation: 喔！

original: Aaa!
translation: 啊！

original: Ugaa!
translation: 呃啊！

original: Uwa!
translation: 呜啊！

original: Agh, my head!
translation: 啊！我的头！

original: My arm!
translation: 我的胳膊！

original: Ugh! My leg!
translation: 啊！我的腿！

original: Urgh!
Agghhh!
Damn it!
translation: 该死！

original: Agh, my head!
translation: 啊！我的头！

original: Arm's hit!
translation: 胳膊受伤了！

original: Leg's hit!
translation: 腿受伤了！

original: Agghhh!
translation: 啊！

original: Ugh!
translation: 哦！

original: I'm hit!
translation: 我受伤了！

original: Urgh, hit my head!
translation: 噢！打到我的头了！

original: Ugh, got my arm!
translation: 噢！打到我的胳膊了！

original: Hit my damn leg!
translation: 该死！打到我的腿了！

original: Ugh!
translation: 哦！

original: Arrrgh!
Dammit!
translation: 该死！

original: Screw this!
translation: 他妈的！

original: No! I am NOT going back into the cells!
translation: 不！我不要回到牢房里！

original: No way I'm dying up here!
translation: 没办法了，我要死在这了！

original: They're not freezing me again!
translation: 它们不能再冷冻我！

original: I need help!
translation: 我需要帮助！

original: I've got to get to cover!
translation: 我得去躲躲了！

original: Fine. I'll kill you next time.
translation: 很好。下次我会杀了你。

original: All right, all right. Let's both calm down.
translation: 好吧，好吧。让我们都冷静下来。

original: Okay, but you just watch yourself.
translation: 好吧，但你得管好你自己。

original: Get your hand outta' there!
translation: 把你的手拿开！

original: Are you for real?
translation: 你真敢这么做？

original: Hey! Keep your hands to yourself!
translation: 嗨！管好你的手！

original: Uhhh? What are you doing?
translation: 呃！你在干嘛？

original: Bad idea. Very bad idea.
translation: 坏主意。这主意糟透了。

original: Try that again, you draw back a stump.
translation: 再试一次吧，你惹来麻烦了。

original: You got a death wish?!
translation: 你想死吗？

original: Are you out of your fuckin' mind?!
translation: 你他妈的脑子坏了吧？！

original: Are you nuts? Watch it!
translation: 你疯了吗？看着点！

original: What the...? What the hell are you doing?
translation: 这是…？你在搞什么鬼？

original: What the hell is wrong with you?
translation: 你到底出什么鬼问题?

original: You want to die young? Fine by me!
translation: 你想年纪轻轻就死掉？我才不在乎！

original: Yaaaaaaa!
Yeaagh!
Take this!
translation: 接招！

original: Hrrrragh!
Urrrrgh!
I'll kill you!
translation: 我要宰了你！

original: Here, got something for ya!
translation: 这，拿些东西！

original: Fire in the hole!
translation: 要爆炸了！

original: This should mess 'em up!
translation: 这会搞得它们一团糟！

original: That's not good...
translation: 这可不大妙…

original: Oh... crap.
translation: 哦……该死。

original: Watch out!
translation: 注意！

original: INCOMING!
translation: 敌袭！

original: That thing can't be good.
translation: 那可糟糕了。

original: What the hell?
translation: 怎么回事？

original: Uwaaaa, shikaeshi saretaka...
translation: 呜啊~，这算是报应吗…

original: Ugaa!
translation: 呜啊！

original: Unnn gwa!
translation: 呃~呱！

original: God...damn...
translation: 上帝啊…该死…

original: Not here... not now...
translation: 不是这里…不是现在…

original: Can't... breathe...
translation: 不能…呼吸…

original: No... please...no...
translation: 不…拜托…不要…

original: Sorry... I...
translation: 对不起…我…

original: Agggghhhh...
translation: 啊…

original: No. No, it's not right. I am NOT just leaving them here to their fate. I couldn't do that back in Anchorage, and I am not doing it now.
translation: 不。不行，这是不对的。我不能放任它们听天由命。在安克雷奇时我就做不到。现在我也不会这么做。

original: Hey, here's an idea. Why don't you stop worrying about shit that doesn't matter.
translation: 嗨，我有个建议。为什么你就不能别再担心这破事，一切都会好的。

original: I said I've got nothing to talk about. Leave it alone.
translation: 我说了没什么好谈的了。离它远点。

original: <unintelligible>
translation: <莫明其妙的>

original: <unintelligible>
translation: <莫明其妙的>

original: <unintelligible>
translation: <莫明其妙的>

original: This ain't over yet!
translation: 这没完！

original: You'll pay for that!
translation: 你要为此付出代价！

original: No... NO! You bastards!
translation: 不…不！你们这些混蛋！

original: Man down!
translation: 有人阵亡！

original: It's not over... you hear me!?
translation: 这事可没完…听到了吗！？

original: Sons of bitches!
translation: 狗娘养的！

original: Nooooooo!
Move... MOVE!
translation: 走……快走！

original: What?
translation: 什么？

original: You gotta be kidding me. You've already looked, haven't you? You know there's no way out.
translation: 你开玩笑吧。你已经看过了，不是吗？你知道根本没有别的出路。

original: My plan's gonna work. You gotta trust me, kid!
translation: 我的计划可行，你得信任我，孩子！

original: Okay, see now you're getting me frustrated.
translation: 好吧，你现在让我很恼火。

original: You look around here, you tell me there's some other way to do this, and I'll listen. But I'm telling you this'll work.
translation: 你看看四周，要是你能想出别的办法，我就听着。但是我告诉你这法子行得通。

original: All right. I'll hold back on you, make sure you don't get too roughed up, okay?
translation: 行。我会收力的，保证你不会被打得太狠，好吗？

original: And you be ready. Soon as they come in to get us, you take 'em down.
translation: 你做好准备。等他们一来抓我们，你就把他们放倒。

original: All right, good girl.
translation: 好的，乖丫头。

original: Now let's not get too rough here, okay? Gotta make it look good, but don't want to do any serious damage.
translation: 咱们下手别太狠，好吧？得装得像那么回事，但别真弄出什么重伤来。

original: All right, good boy.
translation: 好的，乖小子。

original: Now let's not get too rough here, okay? Gotta make it look good, but don't want to do any serious damage.
translation: 咱们下手别太狠，好吧？得装得像那么回事，但别真弄出什么重伤来。

original: Hey, whoa now. Let's not go down that road, sweetie.
translation: 嘿，慢着。咱们别往那方面想，亲爱的。

original: Take a second and think before you start sayin' stuff that'll get you killed.
translation: 在说些会让自己送命的话之前，先花点时间想一想。

original: I'm telling you, we're gonna have to work together. You keep talkin' like this and I'm gonna have to get out of here on my own, after I put you down.
translation: 我跟你说，我们得合作。你要是还这么说话，那我只好先解决掉你，然后自己离开这儿。

original: So are you in, or what?
translation: 所以，你到底来不来？

original: You've gotta be kidding me. You always this paranoid?
translation: 你一定是在开玩笑吧。你总这么多疑吗？

original: Think about it. You been lyin' here a while now, out cold. If I wanted you dead, why wait till now?
translation: 想想看。你已经昏迷躺在这好一阵子了。要是我想让你死，为啥要等到现在？

original: I could've just made sure you never woke up. No fuss at all. But I didn't, did I?
translation: 我本可以确保你永远醒不过来，一点麻烦都没有。但我没这么做，对吧？

original: So yeah, I'm thinkin' you can afford to show me a little trust. Now are we doin' this, or what?
translation: 所以，我认为你可以给我一点信任。现在，我们是继续，还是怎样？

original: Are you kidding me? Kid, I've looked. Trust me. Ain't no other way out of this little box they got us in.
translation: 你在开玩笑吗？孩子，我找过了。相信我。他们把我们困在这个小笼子里，没有别的出路。

original: You wanna satisfy your curiosity, fine. Go ahead. You poke your little nose around and see what you come up with.
translation: 你想满足你的好奇心，行啊。去吧。你就到处打探打探，看看能发现什么。

original: I think it's worth a try. What's the worst that could happen? Nothing changes, only we've got a few more bruises. Big deal. Let's give it a shot.
translation: 我觉得值得一试。最糟糕能怎么样？无非还是老样子，只是我们身上多几处瘀伤罢了。没什么大不了的。咱们试试吧。

original: I promise I'll go easy on you.
translation: 我保证对你下手会轻点。

original: Hell if I know. But at least it's a start. It's better than sitting here waiting for them to experiment on us even more.
translation: 我哪知道。但至少这是个开始。总比坐在这儿干等着他们对我们做更多实验要强。

original: Yeah, that's what I've got. I don't see you coming up with anything brilliant, Mr. I've Been Here Five Whole Minutes.
translation: 对，这就是我想到的。我可没见你想出什么高招，这位“才刚到这儿五分钟”先生。

original: Yeah, that's what I've got. I don't see you coming up with anything brilliant, Miss I've Been Here Five Whole Minutes.
translation: 对，这就是我想到的。我可没见你想出什么高招，这位“才刚到这儿五分钟”小姐。

original: Oh, sure. Take your time. No rush, not like we're about to be sliced and diced by... who the hell knows what.
translation: 哦，当然。你慢慢想。不急，我们又不是马上就要被……天知道是什么玩意给剁成沫。

original: Fine. So they've kept us alive this long for a reason, right? Seems to me they'd want to make sure we stay alive for now.
translation: 好吧。他们让我们活那么久是有原因的，对吗？在我看来，他们现在似乎想确保我们还活着。

original: So you and me, we have ourselves a little fist-fight. Trick 'em into thinkin' one of us ain't going to last too long.
translation: 所以，你和我，我们来一场小型的拳击赛。骗他们以为我们其中一个快撑不下去了。

original: Make 'em come in here and break it up. And when they do, we turn on 'em. We take out the guards, and get ourselves the hell out of this box.
translation: 引他们进来制止。等他们进来，我们就转头对付他们。解决掉守卫，然后从这破笼子里出去。

original: They want us alive for... something. Who knows what. Point is, if it looks like one of us is gonna kill the other, they'll step in to stop it.
translation: 他们要让我们活着，为了……某些目的。天晓得的呢。关键是，如果看起来我们其中一个要杀了另一个，他们就会介入阻止。

original: So that's what we do. We throw a few punches, make it look real, and then jump 'em when they come in to break it up.
translation: 所以我们就这么办。我们打上几拳，装得像真的一样，等他们进来阻止的时候，就干掉他们。

original: A little of both. It's always worked for me in the past, no reason to second guess it now.
translation: 两者都有吧。这法子以前对我一直很管用，现在没理由怀疑它不行。

original: They're keeping an eye on us, you know? Watching us. So I say we give 'em a little show.
translation: 他们一直在盯我们，你知道吗？监视着我们。所以我说，咱们给他们来点节目。

original: Give 'em a reason to pay a little extra attention to us.
translation: 给他们一个理由，让他们对我们格外关注。

original: Sidekick? Who the hell said anything about a sidekick?
translation: 帮手？到底是谁提帮手这事儿了？

original: That's a shitty attitude, kid, because unless you're willing to work with me, you're going a whole lot of no place.
translation: 态度真够差的，孩子，因为除非你愿意跟我合作，否则你哪儿也去不了。

original: It's going to take both of us to get out of this place.
translation: 要离开这个地方，我们俩都得出力。

original: Your guess is as good as mine. I can't understand what they're saying. I don't remember half of what they did to me, and that might be a good thing.
translation: 你猜的和我想的差不多。我听不懂他们在说什么。他们对我做的事，我有一半都记不起来了，这或许反而是件好事。

original: I know we ain't the only ones in here; there's a whole bunch of us in here. They'll pluck folks out every now and then.
translation: 我知道我们不是这儿唯一的人，这里关着好多人呢。他们时不时就会挑几个人带走。

original: Sometimes they bring 'em back... Sometimes they don't. Either way, I ain't keen to find out what they're doing.
translation: 有时候会把人带回来……有时候就不会。不管怎样，我可不想知道他们在搞什么。

original: You've got it all wrong, kid. You're in here with me. This is my little slice of heaven, not yours.
translation: 你全搞错了，孩子。是你和我待在这儿。这是属于我的一小片天堂，可不是你的。

original: ...not a good time for jokes, I guess.
translation: ……我想，现在可不是开玩笑的时候。

original: Look, I don't know why they put you in here with me. Maybe it's another experiment. Not like I can ask them to find out.
translation: 听着，我不知道他们为什么把你和我放在一起。可能这又是另一个实验。反正我也没法找他们问清楚。

original: But since you asked, name's Somah. Beyond that, I'm thinkin' not much matters if we're gonna stay stuck in here.
translation: 不过既然你问了，我叫索玛。除此之外，我觉得要是我们一直被困在这儿，其他的都没多大意义了。

original: I've been here for a little while, but haven't found a way to...
translation: 我在这儿待了有一阵子了，但还没找到办法……

original: Shit. You hear that? It's coming again... Get back against the wall, now!
translation: 该死。你听到了吗？那又来了……快靠墙站好，快！

original: Now you're talkin'.
translation: 终于说到点子上了。

original: I can tell you there ain't an easy way out of here. I've looked around, and I can't find any panels, wires, circuits... nothing.
translation: 我可以告诉你，从这儿出去可不容易。我四处找过了，找不到任何面板、电线、电路……什么都没有。

original: I'm thinkin' they did us a favor, putting us together in here like this. And I say we use it to our advantage.
translation: 我想他们这样把我们放在一起，反倒帮了我们一个忙。我说，咱们得利用这一点作为我们的优势。

original: And for the record, the name's Somah. Nice to meet you.
translation: 记好了，我叫索玛，很高兴见到你。

original: Okay, yeah. Yeah, let's do something about getting out.
translation: 对，是啊。嗯，让我们做点啥从这里出去。

original: Well, there ain't no easy way out. Trust me, I've looked. Can't even find anything to pry open, see what's blocking the doorway.
translation: 唉，根本没有轻松的出路。相信我，我看过了。连能用来撬一撬，看看是什么堵住门口的东西都找不到。

original: I'm thinkin' they did us a favor, putting us together in here like this. And I say we use it to our advantage.
translation: 我想他们这样把我们放在一起，反倒帮了我们一个忙。我说，咱们得利用这一点作为我们的优势。

original: You and me both, kid.
translation: 我也是啊，孩子。

original: Wish I'd never heard that damn radio signal. Thought I could scav some tech from whatever it came from. Sure as hell wasn't expecting this.
translation: 真希望我从没听到过那该死的无线电信号。我本以为能从信号源那里搜刮些技术玩意儿。万万没想到会是这样。

original: Crazy, ain't it? I thought I'd seen some shit out there in the Wastes, but nothin' like this.
translation: 很疯狂，不是吗？我原以为在荒原上已经见识过不少怪事，但没见过像这样的。

original: Not a whole lot of good news goin' around right now. If you're lucky, they'll leave you alone for a while. If not...
translation: 现在可没什么好消息。要是你运气好，他们会让你消停一会儿。要是不好……

original: Well, then it's been nice chatting with you.
translation: 那好吧，很高兴和你谈心。

original: Me? I'm the same as you, I figure. Went pokin' around someplace I shouldn't have, and now I'm payin' for it.
translation: 我？我想我和你一样。到了不该去的地方瞎转悠，现在就得为此付出代价。

original: So you and me? We're stuck here, until they decide they want to prod us some more, or worse.
translation: 所以你和我？我们被困在这儿了，直到他们想再来折腾我们，或者更糟的情况。

original: Man, I can't believe this. This is what you call... what is it, irony? Hell, I don't know.
translation: 天哪，我真不敢相信这一切。这就是所谓的……叫什么来着，讽刺？见鬼，我也不知道。

original: Yeah? Well then wake the hell up, 'cause I'm tired of being stuck in it.
translation: 是吗？那赶紧醒醒，因为我受够困在这梦里了。

original: Sorry kid, but this is really happening. You're stuck here, just like me.
translation: 抱歉，孩子，但这一切都是真的。你和我一样，被困在这儿了。

original: Hello? Hi! Hi there! Listen, can you let me out of here?
translation: 喂？嗨！嘿！听着，你能把我从这放出去吗？

original: Please let me out. I can help, honest!
translation: 请放我出去！我会帮上忙的，真的！

original: Can you let me out of here? Please?
translation: 你能让我离开这里吗？拜托？

original: Great!
translation: 好极了！

original: I'm not totally sure what I'm doing here, but I'll try and tinker with it. You just make sure I don't get shot, okay?
translation: 我不是很确定我要在这儿做什么，但我会尽力捣鼓一下。你只要确保我不挨枪子就行，好吗？

original: It's a pretty big place, and I've only seen some of it. They always catch me before I can see the whole thing.
translation: 这地方相当大，我只看过其中一部分。他们总是在我要全部看完的时候逮到我。

original: I've seen the Cryo Lab... that's where they freeze people and cut them up and stuff.
translation: 我看过低温实验室……他们在那里做冷冻和切割人之类的事。

original: And the Hangar... That has the aliens's flying ships and all the stuff they need to fly them.
translation: 还有机库……里面有外星人的飞船，以及驾驶飞船所需的各种装备。

original: And the Robot Assembly is where they build the big metal robots they use.
translation: 机器人装配车间则是他们制造大型金属机器人的地方。

original: But the real important stuff is on the top of the ship. I've never been there.
translation: 但真正重要的东西在飞船顶层。我从没去过那里。

original: Okay. Whatever you think is best.
translation: 好的。你觉得怎样好就怎么办。

original: Putting me on guard duty, huh? Swell.
translation: 让我站岗放哨，哈？真棒。

original: Fine. If I see any aliens, I'll say hello for you.
translation: 行。要是我看到外星人，会代你向他们问好的。

original: Gun? No thanks. I've spent enough time patching up the mess that guns make. I'm no killer.
translation: 枪？还是算了吧。我花了太多时间处理枪造成的烂摊子了。我可不是杀手。

original: Guns were never quite my thing. There were... let's just say there were other folks to take care of that.
translation: 我向来不怎么碰枪。这么说吧……有其他人会去管这事儿。

original: Might want to ask somebody else to help with that.
translation: 这事儿你或许得找别人帮忙。

original: Now you're speakin' my language. Hell yeah, I'll come with you.
translation: 这可说到我心坎上了。当然行，我跟你一起去。

original: Never was really good with those tin cans. I deal with blood and guts better than wires and gizmos. That's why I became a doctor.
translation: 我对那些铁罐头一直不太在行。比起线路和小机件，我更擅长处理血肉之事。这就是我成为医生的原因。

original: Well, I would have been helpful, but seems like you already did plenty of damage in there.
translation: 呃，我本来能帮上忙的，可看样子你已经在那儿搞出不少破坏了。

original: Heck yeah. I can take apart and put together a Protectron with my eyes shut. I'll go with you. Lead on.
translation: 那当然。我闭着眼睛都能拆解再组装一台保护者。我跟你去。带路吧。

original: Whatever they're assembling in there, I ain't gonna be much good to you. I never was much of a builder.
translation: 不管他们在那儿组装什么，我估计都帮不上你什么忙。我向来不太擅长造东西。

original: What's the point? You already did a good bit of the place. Nah... I'll just stay here and guard the Engine Core.
translation: 有什么意义呢？那地方你已经探索得差不多了。不了……我就留在这儿守卫引擎中枢吧。

original: Hmmm. Sounds like I may be of some use in there. If there are other people in stasis, I could help revive them or something. Just watch my back.
translation: 嗯……听起来在那儿我或许能派上用场。要是还有其他人处于静滞状态，我可以帮忙唤醒他们之类的。你只管帮我留意背后就行。

original: I was never very good at the science stuff. But let me know if you need me to fix anything... that's my specialty.
translation: 我从来不擅长科技方面的事。但要是你需要我修理什么东西，尽管说……那是我的专长。

original: Well seein' as I don't even know what a Cryo or a Lab is, I'm guessin' no.
translation: 呃，既然我连“低温”或“实验室”是什么都不知道，我想帮不了你。

original: Doesn't matter now. Only important thing is... Well, I guess it's revenge.
translation: 现在这已经不重要了。唯一重要的是……嗯，我想是复仇。

original: Well, it was getting dark... we had spent the day out in the trenches keeping as many of the guys alive as we could.
translation: 嗯，当时天渐渐黑了……我们一整天都在战壕里，尽可能让更多弟兄活下来。

original: Chinese had been pounding on us all day with artillery from these huge guns they had up on the mountains. It was really a mess.
translation: 中国人一整天都用他们架在山上的巨型火炮向我们猛轰。场面简直一团糟。

original: Anyway, we pitched our tents and stowed our gear to try and catch some shuteye.
translation: 不管怎样，我们支起帐篷，收拾好装备，想眯一会儿。

original: I woke up suddenly to Private Dawkins screaming... he was bathed in some kind of blue light coming from the sky.
translation: 我突然被列兵道金斯的尖叫惊醒……他被一道来自天空的蓝光笼罩着。

original: All of us just froze as he just... well... vanished. We didn't know what happened. Did the Chinese come up with some new weapon?
translation: 我们所有人都僵住了，眼睁睁看着他……嗯……就这么消失了。我们不知道发生了什么。难道是中国人研发出了什么新武器？

original: Moments later, all of us were in the blue light too... the rest you know.
translation: 没过一会儿，我们所有人也都被那道蓝光笼罩……之后的事你就知道了。

original: Not much to tell. I heard that radio signal, thought I'd check it out.
translation: 没什么好说的。我收到了那个电台信号，想过来看看。

original: Thought maybe I could pull some scrap from whatever was sending the signal. Got a little more than I bargained for.
translation: 本以为能从信号源的上弄些可用的零件。结果遇到的远超乎我的预料。

original: No sense in dwelling on it now. Let's just get out of here.
translation: 现在纠结这些也没意义了。咱们赶紧离开这儿吧。

original: Can't say as it matters, or that I'd feel like telling you anyway.
translation: 说了也没什么意义，而且不管怎样，我也不想告诉你。

original: Me? Well, I was a medic with the 108th Infantry Battalion stationed at Anchorage, Alaska.
translation: 我？嗯，我之前是第108步兵营的一名军医，驻扎在阿拉斯加的安克雷奇。

original: I was with a squad of five other medics... our job was to patch everyone up after the Commies gunned them down.
translation: 我和另外五名军医组成一个小队……我们的工作就是在战友被共军枪击后，对他们进行救治。

original: It was pretty bloody... nothing at all like I expected when I gave up my hospital job to enlist in the Army.
translation: 场面相当血腥……和我放弃医院工作参军时所预想的完全不一样。

original: Does it really matter?
translation: 这真的很重要吗？

original: I mean, we're fighting to stay alive here. Whatever I did before we got to this point doesn't mean a whole lot right now.
translation: 我是说，我们在为了活下去拼尽全力。在我们陷入当前困境之前，无论我做过什么，现在看来意义不大。

original: Does it really matter?
translation: 这真的很重要吗？

original: I mean, we're fighting to stay alive here. Whatever I did before we got to this point doesn't mean a whole lot right now.
translation: 我是说，我们在为了活下去拼尽全力。在我们陷入当前困境之前，无论我做过什么，现在看来意义不大。

original: No, no! Don't do it... don't do it.
translation: 不，不！别这样……别这样。

original: It's just that this whole situation is... unbelievable.
translation: 只是这整个情况太……令人难以置信了。

original: I think I need a few minutes to take a breather...
translation: 我想我得花几分钟缓口气……

original: Okay... okay. Whew.
translation: 好……好的。呼。

original: Sorry about all this... I just can't believe this is happening.
translation: 刚才实在不好意思……我真不敢相信会发生这种事。

original: Thank you. Thanks so much. Sorry about all this... I just can't believe this is happening.
translation: 谢谢，非常感谢。很抱歉刚才那样……我只是不敢相信这种事真的发生了。

original: No... no. I'm responsible for those men. They were my team.
translation: 不……不。我要对那些人负责。他们是我的队员。

original: Please, if you mean what you say... that we're all in this together... then you've got to help me find out what happened to them!
translation: 求你了，如果你说的是真的……我们同在一条船……你得帮我弄清楚他们出了什么事！

original: What if they're lost... or frozen like I was... or even dead? I'm responsible for them!
translation: 要是他们迷路了……或者像我之前那样被冻住了……甚至死了？我得对他们负责啊！

original: Please, if you mean what you say... that we're all in this together... then you've got to help me find out what happened to them!
translation: 求你了，如果你说的是真的……我们同在一条船……你得帮我弄清楚他们出了什么事！

original: Oh my god, I'm responsible for them and now they're lost... or dead.
translation: 哦，天啊，我得对他们负责，可现在他们失踪了……或者死了。

original: Please, if you mean what you say... that we're all in this together... then you've got to help me find out what happened to them!
translation: 求你了，如果你说的是真的……我们同在一条船……你得帮我弄清楚他们出了什么事！

original: No! Please don't. It's horrible in there! To think I was just sitting there, frozen like that... I thought I was dead!
translation: 不！别这样。待在那里面太可怕了！想想看，我就那么待在那儿，冻成冰棍似的……我还以为自己死了呢！

original: Just help me get the hell out of this place. I want to get back home... back to my squad.
translation: 帮我离开这个鬼地方吧。我想回家……回到我的小队。

original: Wait a minute! My men... my unit! Have you seen them?
translation: 等等！我的兄弟们……我的部队！你见过他们吗？

original: You do? Then you're telling me the truth. Those... aliens took you too.
translation: 真的吗？那你说的是实话。那些……外星人也抓走了你。

original: Look, I just want to get out of here and get back to things the way they were. Back with my guys...
translation: 听着，我只想离开这儿，让一切恢复原样。回到我的兄弟们身边……

original: Wait a minute! My men... my unit! Have you seen them?
translation: 等等！我的兄弟们……我的部队！你见过他们吗？

original: I... I suppose so.
translation: 我……我想也是。

original: Look, all I want to do is get back home and back to the rest of my squad.
translation: 听着，我只想回家，回到我小队的其余人身边。

original: Wait a minute! My men... my unit! Have you seen them?
translation: 等等！我的兄弟们……我的部队！你见过他们吗？

original: Ha! That doesn't mean anything!
translation: 哈！那说明不了什么！

original: You could be one of those little green guys in human form... or maybe you ARE human and they just took over your mind.
translation: 你有可能是那种变成人类模样的绿色小人……又或许你确实是人类，但他们已经控制了你的思想。

original: We have no idea how limitless their powers are!
translation: 我们根本不清楚他们的能力有多强大！

original: Hey, you could be one of those little green guys in human form... or maybe you ARE human and they just took over your mind.
translation: 嘿，你有可能是那种变成人类模样的绿色小人……又或许你确实是人类，但他们已经控制了你的思想。

original: We have no idea how limitless their powers are!
translation: 我们根本不清楚他们的能力有多强大！

original: I dunno, I dunno... maybe you assumed human form. I heard they could do that... or you are human but they took over your mind!
translation: 我不知道，我不知道……也许你变成了人类的模样。我听说他们能做到这点……又或者你本身是人类，但他们控制了你的思想！

original: We have no idea how limitless their powers are!
translation: 我们根本不清楚他们的能力有多强大！

original: Prisoner? Last thing I remember I was being outside our bunker and then... oh my god!
translation: 囚犯？我记得的最后一件事，是我当时在我们的掩体外面，然后……哦，我的天哪！

original: Aliens! I was taken by aliens! You! You must be the aliens trying to get into my mind... well that's not gonna work!
translation: 外星人！我被外星人抓走了！你们！你们肯定是想窥探我思想的外星人……哼，这可不会得逞！

original: Private Elliott Tercorien, U.S. Army Medic, Serial Number 3477809. That's all I'm telling you.
translation: 列兵埃利奥特·特克里安，美国陆军军医，编号3477809。我就跟你们说这些。

original: My what? Who the hell are you... oh my god.... wait a minute!
translation: 我的什么？你们到底是谁……我的天……等一下！

original: Aliens! I was taken by aliens! You! You must be the aliens trying to get into my mind... well that's not gonna work!
translation: 外星人！我被外星人抓走了！你们！你们肯定是想窥探我思想的外星人……哼，这可不会得逞！

original: Private Elliott Tercorien, U.S. Army Medic, Serial Number 3477809. That's all I'm telling you.
translation: 列兵埃利奥特·特克里安，美国陆军军医，编号3477809。我就跟你们说这些。

original: What? I've never seen any of you before in my life. Last people I saw were... oh my god!
translation: 什么？我这辈子从没见过你们任何人。我最后见到的人是……哦，我的天呐！

original: Aliens! I was taken by aliens! You! You must be the aliens trying to get into my mind... well that's not gonna work!
translation: 外星人！我被外星人抓走了！你们！你们肯定是想窥探我思想的外星人……哼，这可不会得逞！

original: Private Elliott Tercorien, U.S. Army Medic, Serial Number 3477809. That's all I'm telling you.
