original: I was driving along the highway when there was this light... and suddenly I'm on this real spaceship! No joke!
translation: 我在高速上开车时突然眼前一闪…我就在这太空船上了！不骗你！

original: Now these little green men are making all these noises and pointing at stuff trying to talk to me! I bet I'm the first one they've met!
translation: 现在这些小绿人又吵又闹的，指来指去一直想要跟我说话！我应该是它们见到的第一个人类。

original: So I figure I'll talk with them a while then I'll join you later and I can tell you all about it over lunch! Oh! If only I had my camera!
translation: 所以我想跟它们先聊一下，等一下我就去你，午饭时我可以跟你讲现在的事。对了，如果现在有相机就好了！

original: Well, they're pointing at some table with all sorts of gizmos sticking out of it. Gotta go. Kisses!
translation: 对了，它们正在指着一个桌子，上面有一些小东西。要走喽！亲！

original: Our defenses consist of 3 battalions of light infantry, 34 pieces of field artillery, 108 armored vehicles and 42 aerial vehicles.
translation: 我们的防御包括3个轻步兵营，34门重炮，108辆装甲车辆以及42个飞行单位。

original: We have 38 ICBM's always on alert and ready to fire when the word is passed down from the White House.
translation: 我们有38枚受命白宫随时准备发射的洲际导弹。

original: The codes to activate the launch sequences are... are... uhhngh.... no... I can't let you... uggh... get out of my mind!
translation: 发射导弹的密码是……是……啊~~……不……我不能让你们……噢……从我的脑子滚出去！

original: Agggh! The c-codes... are... ugh.... no... I can't betray... AGH! My head! I can't... won't... AGGGGH! Agggh...
translation: 啊~~~！密……密码……是……噢……不……我不能背叛……唔呃！我的头！我不能……不会……啊~~~！啊~~~……

original: I'm Holly Barrisford, a linguistics specialist for the U.S.S.A. I think I'm beginning to understand you, but you need to stop shocking me!
translation: 我是霍利·贝尔斯福德，美国太空总署的语言学专家。我已经开始明白你们的语言，请你们不要再电击我了！

original: Damn. I wish you could understand me. <Alien Noises>. Do you understand?
translation: 该死。我真希望你们能明白我在说什么。<模仿外星语>你们明白吗？

original: That's it. You get it. I mean you no harm, I just want to learn how to speak with you. Then perhaps we can discuss what you need from us.
translation: 那就对了。你明白了吧，我没有敌意，我只是在学着如何跟你们沟通。或许我们可以探讨一下你想从我们这里得到什么。

original: What are you doing with that needle? No! Get it away from me! NO! PLEASE! We can be friends! You don't need to... ahhhhh.
translation: 你要用那根针做什么？不！把它从我面前拿开！不！求你了！我们可以成为朋友！没有必要…啊~~~。

original: Well, this is just ridiculous! I demand to see whomever's in charge!
translation: 真荒唐！我要见你们的主管！

original: OW! What the? Do you have any idea who you're dealing with?!
translation: 啊！干什么？你知道你们现在在跟谁说话吗？

original: AGH! Stop it! I am a U.S. Senator and I warn you... if any harm comes to me, you'll bring the full wrath of the U.S. Military upon yourselves!
translation: 啊！住手！我是美国国会参议员。我现在警告你！如果你敢动我一条汗毛，我会动用整个美国的军事力量让你们尝尝愤怒的滋味！！

original: What? Where are you taking me?! Get your goddamn hands off of me! You'll all pay for this! The U.S. doesn't bargain with aliens!
translation: 什么？你要带我去哪里？把你的臭手从我身上拿开！你会因此付出代价的！美国是绝对不会跟外星人讨价还价的！！

original: Yeah, you're probably right. Wait, did you feel that?
translation: 嗯，你说得可能没错。等等，你感觉到了吗？

original: Yeah, it is kinda stinky in here... Did you cut the cheese?
translation: 是啊，这儿确实有点臭……你是不是放屁了？

original: No way! Well, maybe a little. I bet we can find something neat, though!
translation: 才不是！嗯，或许有一点点。不过我敢说我们会发现些有意思的东西！

original: It looks like they're dropping shields to prepare for a big shot.
translation: 看起来它们削弱护盾是要给我们来一发狠的。

original: Damn it.  Their shields are back up at max.
translation: 该死。它们的护盾能量又充满了。

original: I've got a lock on their ship, fire when ready!
translation: 我已经锁定了它们的飞船，随时可以开火！

original: The squiggles around their ship are going away, but there's more appearing by their gun.
translation: 它们飞船周围的波纹消失了，但大炮周围却增加了。

original: Their shields are at full.
translation: 护盾充能完毕。

original: The enemies shields are down! Fire! Fire! Shoot 'em!
translation: 敌人的护盾减弱了！开火！开火！干掉它们！

original: Pretty neat. I'm still exploring some of the rest of the ship using the vents. There's a bunch of places I never saw before.
translation: 很好，我用通风口探索。我还有很多地方没去过。

original: I saw a shooting star out the window!
translation: 我在窗外看到流星！

original: I'm okay. It's fun to just sit and look at the earth sometimes.
translation: 我很好。偶尔坐下来看看地球也很有趣。

original: I told Mr. Elliott this really funny joke earlier, but he didn't get it. He's weird.
translation: 我之前给埃利奥特先生讲了个很好笑的笑话，但他没听懂。他真怪。

original: Yep, sure thing!
translation: 当然，没问题！

original: Here you go.
translation: 给你。

original: Here's everything I've got.
translation: 这是我拿到的所有东西。

original: We don't have anything else stockpiled right now. Sorry.
translation: 抱歉我们现在没有其他储备了。抱歉。

original: Sorry boss, not right now. Anything turns up, and I'll let you know.
translation: 抱歉，老大，现在没有。一有消息我就会让你知道的。

original: No, but we're still checking the rest of the ship as best we can.
translation: 没有，但我们仍在尽可能检查飞船其它地方。

original: Nope, I'll go back out and look for more stuff soon.
translation: 没，我很快会再出去找找更多东西。

original: No, sir! Nothing new!
translation: 没有，长官！一切照旧！

original: Nuh-uh. If I find anything else, I'll let you know!
translation: 没有。要是我发现别的情况，会告诉你的！

original: Oh, yeah! Here, you can have this stuff. I found it when I was looking around the rest of the ship.
translation: 哦，对了！给，这些东西你拿去吧。我在飞船其他地方查看的时候找到的。

original: Yep, I was able to scrounge up some more stuff for you. Here you go, Captain!
translation: 有，我又给你搜罗到了一些东西。给你，舰长！

original: Sir, yes sir! I found some more supplies for you, sir!
translation: 长官，有汇报！长官，我又给您找到了些补给物资！

original: Grab anything useful, and let's go. Who knows how long it'll be before they send more after us!
translation: 拿上所有有用的东西，咱们走。谁知道他们多久之后会再派人来追我们！

original: To General Constantine Chase, Anchorage Command. Encoded message 457980-A. Decryption applied.
translation: 致康斯坦丁·蔡斯将军，安克雷奇指挥部。编码信息457980-A，已解密。

original: These crates contain only a portion of the items you requested on 09/17/77. Due to the increase in demand, we were unable to fill the entire order.
translation: 这批货箱中只装有你在09/17/77所申请之物资的一部分。由于需求的增加，我们无法完成整个订单。

original: Please distribute this equipment based on greatest need and we'll attempt to send the rest of your request as soon as possible.
translation: 请基于优先需求分配装备，我们将尝试尽快满足您余下的需求。

original: Enclosed you'll also find our new improved LAS-009 General's Overcoat. Hope it will serve as an appropriate upgrade.
translation: 你会发现箱内附有我们新改进的 LAS-009型将官大衣。希望这次升级会是妥善的。

original: General Victor Breckenridge, U.S. Army Quartermaster Command Forward Depot, Oregon.
translation: 维克多·布雷肯里奇将军，美国陆军后勤司令部中转站，俄勒冈州。

original: Onushi, naniyue sonoyo ni hanasu? Nanika shomo no mono demo arunoka?
translation: 阁下，为何如此说？难道说还有妖魔之类在吗？

original: Oh, korekoso sessha no ken. Katajike nai.
translation: 哦，这正是在下的剑。万分感激。

original: Sumanuga, sessha mizukara korekara okorukotoni sonaeneba naranu.
translation: 抱歉，在下必须独自应对今后所发生之事。

original: Oh, sessha no ken! Kaeshite moraerutowa, katajike nai.
translation: 哦，在下的剑！承蒙寻回，万分感激。

original: Sumanuga, sessha mizukara korekara okorukotoni sonaeneba naranu.
translation: 抱歉，在下必须独自应对今后所发生之事。

original: Sure I do! I found a secret place they've never noticed. You want some of the stuff I have? Come on, I'll show you!
translation: 当然！我发现了一个它们从来没有注意到的秘密地点，你想要一些我有的材料？来吧，我带你去！

original: Doesn't matter. They're not getting it, whatever it is.
translation: 无所谓。不管他们想要什么，都别想得到。

original: Hell if I know. I don't plan on starting a conversation to ask, you know?
translation: 我哪知道。反正我不打算主动搭话去问，你懂吧？

original: Isn't it obvious? They're probably using us as guinea pigs, examining our anatomy.
translation: 不是很明显吗？他们很可能把我们当小白鼠了，研究我们的身体结构。

original: Once they've figured out how to make exact copies of us, they'll send those copies back down to earth to take our places.
translation: 一旦他们弄清楚如何完美复制我们，就会把那些复制品送回地球取代我们。

original: When they've copied enough of us, they'll turn on us and take over the world. Come on, how can you not see that coming?
translation: 等他们复制出足够多的人，就会对我们下手，进而接管地球。拜托，你怎么就看不出来这一切即将发生呢？

original: Maybe they're going to take over the whole planet.
translation: 也许他们打算接管整个地球。

original: Like, maybe they've been coming here for hundreds... no, thousands of years, waiting to hit us when we're not expecting it.
translation: 比如说，也许他们几百……不，几千年来一直都在往这儿来，就等着趁我们毫无防备的时候发起攻击。

original: And then they wipe us out, and strip the planet of all its resources. I bet that's it.
translation: 然后他们把我们消灭殆尽，把地球上的资源掠夺一空。我敢说就是这样。

original: What if this is just some horrible misunderstanding? Like, what if some radio waves got beamed into space and made it all the way to their planet.
translation: 要是这仅仅是一场可怕的误会呢？比如说，要是一些无线电波发射到了太空，一路传到了他们的星球。

original: Only they didn't hear the nightly news or whatever, to them it sounded like a declaration of war. So they decided to attack us first.
translation: 只不过他们没听出来是晚间新闻之类的。对他们来说，这听起来就像是宣战。所以，他们决定先手进攻。

original: Seriously, this whole thing could totally be our fault! Do you realize that?
translation: 说真的，这整件事可能完全是我们的错！你意识到了吗？

original: Hmm... maybe, just maybe, they're responsible for life on earth. Like, they seeded the planet a really long time ago.
translation: 嗯……可能，仅是可能，地球上的生命是他们造就的。比如说，他们很久以前就在地球上播种生命了。

original: And they've been coming back every once in a while to check on the progress... and now they've decided they don't like how it turned out.
translation: 然后他们时不时回来查看进展……而现在，他们觉得事情发展的结果不如意。

original: Can you imagine? They made us and now they're pissed at us!
translation: 你能想象吗？他们创造了我们，现在却对我们大为光火！

original: Fine.
translation: 行啊。

original: So you... you know?
translation: 这么说你……你知道了？

original: There's not much more to say. Wasn't just me sucked up into this place... My wife and my boy, too.
translation: 没什么可说的了。被卷进这个地方的不只有我……还有我的妻子和儿子。

original: I can still hear 'em, crying out to me, begging me to save 'em. And there wasn't a damned thing I could do.
translation: 我至今仍能听到他们呼喊我，求我救他们。我他妈的却无能为力。

original: They were... they were everything to me, you know? So now I've got nothing. Nothing at all.
translation: 他们……他们就是我的一切，你明白吗？而现在我一无所有，什么都没了。

original: Okay? Lemme ask you something -- you ever listened to the two people you care most about in this world screaming in pain?
translation: 好吧。我问问你—你是否听到在这世界上你最关心的两个人痛苦的尖叫声?

original: Huh? You ever watched them screaming, looking to you to save them, only you can't do anything about it?
translation: 怎么？你曾看着他们痛苦，想去帮助他们，但你却无能为力？

original: If you had ANY idea what that feels like, you'd know damn well it's not okay.
translation: 如果你有那样的想法，那不是很好。

original: I lost my wife and my boy to these monsters, and they are going to suffer for it.
translation: 我失去妻子和孩子，落在了那些怪物手中，它们会付出代价的。

original: Well, I appreciate that, miss. It's just that it's not easy to talk about.
translation: 嗯，很感激你这么说，小姐。只是这事儿不太好开口。

original: I... I lost my wife and my boy.
translation: 我……我失去了我的妻子和儿子。

original: One minute, we're riding back from town. Next, we're floating in the sky. Then we're here.
translation: 前一分钟，我们还在从镇上骑马回家。接着，我们就飘到了空中。然后就到了这儿。

original: They're screaming and crying, and I can't do a thing to help them. Haven't seen them since.
translation: 他们尖叫着、哭喊着，可我却无能为力。从那以后我就再也没见过他们。

original: And now someone's going to pay for it.
translation: 现在，有人得为此付出代价。

original: Well, at least it wasn't coming for us...
translation: 好吧，至少它不是冲着我们来的……

original: Uhh... okay... So, does that mean you're in?
translation: 喔…好吧…你要来真的吗？

original: Oh, no way. NO WAY. This is a bad dream, right? I'm dreaming? Shit...
translation: 哦，不可能。绝对不可能。这是个噩梦，对吧？我在做梦呢？该死……

original: So what, I'm being held hostage now or something? I'm some kind of prisoner?
translation: 所以呢，我现在是被挟持为人质了还是怎样？我成囚犯了？

original: Listen, if this is because of what we did... I just worked for those guys, okay? It's not like I enjoyed it.
translation: 听着，如果这是因为我们做过的事……我只是为那些家伙办事，好吗？我又不是乐在其中。

original: I was just in it for the caps, all right? Can I go now?
translation: 我不过是为了瓶盖才干的，行了吧？我现在能走了吗？

original: Hello, Mr. Alien. Yeah, I know... I'll talk into the thing.
translation: 你好，外星人先生。嗯，我知道……我会对着那东西讲话的。

original: I don't know why you brought me back here. We've done this a whole bunch of.... Hey! Giddyup Buttercup! Wow!
translation: 我不知道你为什么带我回来。我们已经做过很多次了……嘿！奶油小马！哇哦！

original: I always wanted one of those!... Why do you have one?
translation: 我一直想要一个！……你怎么会有？

original: I don't understand... What do you want? It's a toy. A TOY. Why are you so excited? You're weird.
translation: 我不懂……你想要什么？这是玩具。一个玩具。你为什么这么兴奋？你真奇怪。

original: Oh, great.
translation: 哦，真棒。

original: All right, listen. Not that it's any of your damn business, but yeah. Before I got sucked up into crazy alien land here, I pulled some shady stuff.
translation: 好吧，听着。虽说这不关你屁事，但没错。在我被卷进这疯狂的外星人世界之前，我做过些不光彩的事。

original: Many of my associates may or may not have been slavers, and I may or may not have received payment for helping them in their trade.
translation: 我的很多伙伴可能是奴隶贩子，也可能不是，而我可能收了钱帮他们做奴隶买卖，也可能没有。

original: Okay? Big secret exposed! Great job! Hope you're happy.
translation: 行了吧？重大秘密曝光了！干得好！希望你满意。

original: A reason? Yeah, there's a reason. It's because I worked for slavers, okay? I worked for them, I helped them, and sometimes I liked it.
translation: 原因？是的，是有原因。我为奴隶贩子工作，对吧？我为他们工作，我帮助他们，我就喜欢这样。

original: They needed someone who was good with machines, stripping tech, building shit. That's me.
translation: 他们需要擅长摆弄机器的人，精通技术，制造机器。那个人就是我。

original: So I did the work. And look where it got me. Now can we stop talking about me?
translation: 是的，那就是我做的，看看我得到了什么？现在能不能别再讨论我了？

original: Already forgotten. Let's just get back to the whole "not getting killed by crazy space men" thing.
translation: 已经忘了。咱们还是回到“不被疯狂的太空人杀掉”这件事上吧。

original: Well listen, it's not like I even wanted to be there, okay?
translation: 听着，我根本不想去那里，好吗？

original: I'm good with tech. These guys needed someone who knows her way around machines. They just happened to be slavers.
translation: 我的手艺不错。这些家伙需要有人摆弄那些机器。他们刚好是奴隶主。

original: I mean come on, what was I supposed to do? They took care of me, and as long as I didn't think about where the caps came from, it was fun.
translation: 我的意思是，拜托，我该怎么办？他们照顾我，只要我不去想那些瓶盖是哪来的，就很开心了。

original: Oh. He left.
translation: 哦。他走了。

original: He used the teleporter after you did. Said he didn't have any reason to stay... but I don't know where he was going to go.
translation: 他在你之后用了传送装置。他说自己没什么理由继续留下……但我不清楚他具体要去哪里。

original: I'm going to miss him. He was quiet, but I think it's because he was really sad.
translation: 我会想他的。他一直很安静，但我觉得那是因为他真的很伤心。

original: He took off just after you did. Said there was no reason for him to hang around here, that he might as well go see what it was like down there.
translation: 你走后他就走了。说是没理由留在这里了，倒不如下去看看那里的情况。

original: I wasn't about to tell him he couldn't go...
translation: 我自然不会拦他……

original: Well, we were just in a really big space battle with a UFO... the ship is probably pretty damaged.
translation: 嗯，我们只是在非常大的空间和UFO战斗…飞船可能会严重损毁。

original: But that's okay, we can just stay on the bridge. And I can try and explore through the vents to see if there's anywhere else to go.
translation: 那还好，我们可以待在舰桥上，我可以从通风口看看有没有别的地方可以走。

original: I bet it's a safety mechanism, designed to seal off damaged areas of the ship. At least, that's what I'd do if I were designing a spaceship.
translation: 我确信这是一个安全机制，它会关闭受损的区域。至少，如果是我，我会这么设计宇宙飞船的。

original: Probably means the rest of the ship is so badly damaged that it decompressed. My guess is you don't WANT to open that door.
translation: 大概意思是这艘飞船严重损毁而变形了，我猜你不想打开那扇门。

original: Oh man, I've seen this on TV...
translation: 哇，我在电视上见过这个…

original: ...you're going to eat me, aren't you? I'm like some sort of delicacy on your planet, right? RIGHT?
translation: …你正准备吃掉我，对吧？我就像你们星球上的一道佳肴，没错吧？对不对？

original: Well I hope you choke! I hope you stuff your stupid little green faces and choke to death!
translation: 我希望你噎死！我希望你们这些绿脸的小白痴因为狼吞虎咽而面容扭曲到噎死！

original: ...Unless this is like that other show where I get put in some sort of weird alien zoo... That might be okay...
translation: …要不这就好像我进到某种稀奇古怪的外星人动物园里的另类展览…那或许还不错…

original: <Mooing>
translation: <牛叫声>

original: <sobbing>
translation: <哭泣声>

original: Please.... just please, let me go...
translation: 拜托……拜托了，让我走吧……

original: <mechanical sounds>
translation: <机器声>

original: Okay! That should do it! I'll be back out in a minute!
translation: 好！这样就行了！我一会就回来！

original: Hey! If I could I would! Some of the vents are so small in there, even I can't crawl through them.
translation: 嘿！假如我能的话那我会的！但那的通风口实在太小了，连我都没办法钻过去。

original: Sorry, you'll just have to blow up those generators and get the door open yourself.
translation: 对不起，那只好由你亲自去毁掉那些发电机然后让这门打开。

original: Well, not really shut it off... More like blow it up. If you turn off the coolant, it'll get really hot and then explode, so be careful, okay?
translation: 嗯，也不是真的把它关掉……更像是把它炸了。如果你关掉冷却剂，它会变得非常热然后爆炸，所以要小心，好吗？

original: You have to shut that off to open the door here.
translation: 你得关掉那个才能打开这的门。

original: What the hell is this thing? What are we supposed to do with it?
translation: 这到底是什么东西？我们该拿它怎么办？
